If you don't understand how to forward ports or how to use DDNS, you might want to ask a tech friend to help, or call Foscam to help with the setup.Make sure to get everything configured and verify connectivity BEFORE you mount the camera high up on your garage, and BEFORE you crawl on your stomach to the corner of your attic to plug the camera in. It can be very frustrating having to repeat that process multiple times. It ended up being my fault, but I almost chucked the camera in the pool out of anger.I give this camera 4.5 stars just because of the video quality at night.

Reviews.Title: So Far Working flawlessly
Reviews.Author: Teresa
Reviews.Content: We have had a very cold winter here in West Ar. Ordered this camera on Feb 21, 2014 got it a few days later. The temps since i have had this camera in use has been down to 9 degrees. The camera is still operation normal. I will update this review in the coming months.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Kent
Reviews.Content: Connected this camera for a customer near their gate.  Picture was good both in light and dark.  The IR illumination works well.  I used the ethernet connection so I can't say how well the wireless works.  Keep in mind that if you were going to use multiple cameras via wireless your available bandwidth will be eaten up by all the video.

Reviews.Title: Thank you Foscam for your EXCELLANT custoner support.
Reviews.Author: James D.
Reviews.Content: Foscam delivered as advertized. Foscan technition was able to adjust and correct any connection errors and get Camers running as required.  A+++

Reviews.Title: non working in only 3 weeks how do i replace
Reviews.Author: Larry W.
Reviews.Content: telescoping antenna will not stay affixed it spins and camera shorts out causing no picture. have one other and it works well,mounting fixture is flimsy

Reviews.Title: If you are looking for something small and discrete, this isn't the one for you.
Reviews.Author: Jason K Salada
Reviews.Content: I admit, I didn't look closely at the measurements before I bought it.  But I never expected this to be as big as a coffee can.  I'm not sure if I even want to attempt setting it up because I was honestly looking for something that didn't stand out like THIS WILL hanging from the eves of my garage.  Hanging it from a high second story location would probably be fine, but I will probably return it since I want the camera at the garage location.Plus I'm not certain this camera wasn't in someone elses hands before Amazon sent it to me.  The box appeared to have been opened before and the camera case had a few scratches on it.  The shield on top does not line up correctly either.  As far as I know its a great camera, just not what I am looking for.  I'll keep searching for something a little smaller in the meantime.

Reviews.Title: Bulky but did the job
Reviews.Author: Sweetboy
Reviews.Content: I hope it can rotate or zoom but NO. It's a big bulky for the technology. The night vision is ok not best. I won't buy this again but get better quality for more money. However i satisfied which this

Reviews.Title: Great cameras for outside
Reviews.Author: AmazonBuyer
Reviews.Content: We really enjoy these cameras.  They are fairly ruggedized, and their IR works really well.  Foscam's customer support was extraordinary, helping us get all of our cameras to stop dropping the connection.  Excellent price!

Reviews.Title: Good camera and support
Reviews.Author: alex trim
Reviews.Content: Box came without direct modem cable or software - however Foscam site had correct download, and I had lots of cables. Mystery was how to set it up... so used 24/7 line:Tech support: Irish was spectacular - what would have taken me hours and multiple calls to resolve, he fixed in under an hour with remote access.Set up not only local access, then wifi access, then access through iPhone - all flawless nowGreat picture clarityNeeded camera for monitoring and communication during major construction project so can communicate with contractor when out of the house. Long term general video security since we travel a lot.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Technical Support was Quick and Efficient
Reviews.Author: George G. Chachas
Reviews.Content: I needed help with setting up the cameras remotely to view it from the phone and also to set up motion alarm on the camera. Ralph was great.  He set up a remote session, went through and corrected all settings, reviewed and made sure the router settings we corrected. He assisted me in getting the e-mail alarms settings established. Once completed he made sure to test everything to make sure it was working correctly and provided me the pertinent information for future access.  These are the first two Foscam cameras I've purchase and so far the ease of set up and quality are great.  I would highly recommend Ralph and these Foscam products.

Reviews.Title: Foscam FI8905W
Reviews.Author: JustDeals919
Reviews.Content: Knight from support was excellent. my camera was not broadcasting my ip address, he remote access my pc and fixed the issue. super fast customer support, will definately buy anither foscam again  THANKS AGAIN

Reviews.Title: Excellent Quality
Reviews.Author: kjan63
Reviews.Content: Being unsure about being able to setup a security system I chose this model, based on previous reviews! I could not be happier with my home security as the clarity of the camera could not be any better. Best night time security available in my opinion. The night time IR view is better than I ever expected from a wireless camera! I plan to purchase a few more. Easy quick setup on a network via MacBook and then instant access on the Ipad to control the camera settings via the APP. If you want home security without spending a fortune this is the camera...

Reviews.Title: Worth the money!
Reviews.Author: M. Thomas
Reviews.Content: Good pictures. Only thing I would like to see is a guest account where people can watch without entering a password.

Reviews.Title: Customer Service is Great!
Reviews.Author: Ronnie King
Reviews.Content: I just purchased 3 of these cameras. I could get them all to work via ethernet, but not wireless. I called their Tech Support, and the lovely lady spent over 1/2 hour with me, upgrading the firmware, setting up the wireless and port forwarding. All 3 cameras now work wirelessly, and I can access them all via smart phone. The customer service is first rate! Hopefully the cameras will be also! Many thanks Foscam.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: frances
Reviews.Content: works great outside but dosent zoom in close to see whats going, it will hook up with computer , but cant get it to work like its supposed to.

Reviews.Title: Good Support
Reviews.Author: tytewad
Reviews.Content: I needed help configuring the settings and the support was very good. CHRIS JOHNSON was very helpful.Camera looks good so far.

Reviews.Title: Good picture, bad interface.
Reviews.Author: summerholiday2
Reviews.Content: This has a good nightime picture but not a good interface and not good at streaming a signal.  Only use this if you are live-monitoring your cameras or have a dedicate machine constantly recording.  The firmware is junk.Wireless works only intermittently.

Reviews.Title: Exceeded my expectation for price.
Reviews.Author: Greg Lawson
Reviews.Content: First outdoor camera to go with 4 8910,s that are also being used outside. Easy setup, very good day and night video, motion detection, and range. Used with Blue Iris Software. No complaints so far. I would recommend this camera to my friends.

Reviews.Title: Works ok, but as many have said long expect wide angle shot
Reviews.Author: NEfanman
Reviews.Content: This camera was fairly easy for me to set up.  Once I got it connected and hooked up where I wanted it the lens was not wide enough.  I read all the reviews before making the purchase but have to tell you the 50mm will not be the best choice for a lot of people.  It would be good high up on a building, otherwise just too close.  This camera is also fairly close to my wireless router but loses the signal a lot, had to purchase separate antenna in anticipation that will work.  Picture is good, software and support is good as well.

Reviews.Title: Like it
Reviews.Author: D. S
Reviews.Content: Had problems updating product and setting up wifi  so I called their Customer service hotline- only waited for a few minutes and everything was set-up in a breeze. The in-door foscam 8910 I purchased along w/ this outdoor  8905 is doing great. The pictures are discernible w/ motion detection capabilities.. but I will find out how it goes in the long run and for an affordable product w/ great customer service/help line I have no complaints so far...(Just by the way check completely what's in your package 'coz this one came w/out a Wi-Fi antenna )

Reviews.Title: Not bad for the price!
Reviews.Author: playaplaya
Reviews.Content: Night time light sensitivity is great, set up is fairly easy, and FOSCAM Support is definitely there to answer your questions. Just keep in mind you can also call your ISP for help setting up the Remote Viewing. I have had this camera running for a couple weeks now and I cant complain. Happy with its quality for the price.

Reviews.Title: I spy!
Reviews.Author: Bob C
Reviews.Content: This has been a very good unit.  I have it on my front porch and it never fails.  Have since purchased several Foscams and will look for more deals

Reviews.Title: Customer service tries to decieve the reviews
Reviews.Author: Trixy 23
Reviews.Content: Tonight, I had an okay experience with the phone tech support.  I had a very difficult time understanding the tech's language due to an accent barrier.  Lastly, when I was done with support, I was directed to the Amazon site, while the tech still had control of my computer.  He stayed on the line and encouraged me to review this camera EVEN THOUGH IT WASN'T A REVIEW FOR PRODUCT.  Needless to say, he wanted me to give the camera a good rating, even though he had just helped me set it up.  I had less than 5-minute experience with the product, but again, he just wanting the rating for the camera whether it was the service or the product.

Reviews.Title: ordered 2, had to retrun 1
Reviews.Author: MrBOFH
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately one of the 2 cameras I ordered  has a broken IR cut filter so I had to return it as it would only show B/W and very fuzzy at that. . The other one works great.ProLastest firmware/Web UI update has a better interface for non IE browsersThe IR cut filter works very well, colors are very good if in no IR mode.Does very well in a darkish room during configuration.Supports Wireless-NConThe pigtail with cat5, power and reset/WPS buitton is a bit scary as it provides easy access and cannot be hidden/enclosed in the bundled mount.Bundled mount is a bit flimsy.I will definately be ordering another one next time it;s on sale.

Reviews.Title: Does still pics well, but does not work well for video.
Reviews.Author: Koset
Reviews.Content: While it does motion sensor and still pics well, I was disappointed that its video capability is limited.  Decided to keep it for back yard, but still needed a better one for video. Caveat emptor.

Reviews.Title: Pros and Cons..
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: Hmm, where to start. Good quality picture/video, even outside, though you have to change it to outside mode via settings in browser. This 6mm lens is a serious zoom in, so you have to get the camera perfect for what your trying to watch, in my case I have it 50ft away from the front door to get a close up shot of any intruder. That is all your going to get though, just a little area, there is no zoom or wide angle on this. Quality is pretty good, I am impressed on that aspect, disappointed in the lack of wide angle. The huge blow that if I could return it, I would aspect: The camera keeps changing IP address' so the port forwarding to view the camera on my phone or any computer away from home keeps failing. I have not figured out why, I have multiple cameras and only this camera keeps doing it. I have to update the IP address in my router settings at least twice a week. So this camera does not work the way I need it too, but may work for you if you dont need to view it away from home. So I would personally return this item and shop for a different one. I do have other cameras of this Brand "Foscam" and like i said before those work fine like it should.Updated 8/25/13: I was able to change the settings for the camera to stop changing IP. It was not in a place I would have looked at. So I have since changed my review rating. I am happy with the camera, only disappointment is the lack of wide angle. I can no view this camera on my phone and tablet without a problem. I have noticed another problem. When it sends the alarm email with the picture it took, it has the wrong date in the email. I assume this is just a glitch and it is not an issue as the picture is dated properly, but the email is dated wrong.

Reviews.Title: FI8905W set up & performance
Reviews.Author: Walter O. Ledig
Reviews.Content: With some considerable help from Ryan at Foscam Tech support I was able to get my camera up and running in short order. I was very impressed with Foscam's technical support which was fast, knowledgeable, and courteous. The camera performs very well with a narrow viewing angle. For the price the picture is clear and is exactly what I wanted. I have it running on an old Dell XPS M1530 laptop and I am waiting for the blue Iris software as I plan to add several more cameras. I currently have an indoor camera, Foscam FI8918W as well as the new FI8905W and both are viewable using my Samsung Galaxy Note 2.Again as I am not an IT person thanks again to Ryan at Foscam Tech support.

Reviews.Title: Foscam FI8905W Outdoor Wireless/Wired IP/Network Camera with 30 Meter Night~ LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: SHERI MOSER
Reviews.Content: Works wonderful! easy for me to hook up, however someone who does not know computer's would have a hard time,I get Video clips saved to my computer and email alerts sent to my phone . With Free apps that I installed for my phone I can control the camera .Thanks, Sheri MGreat to have a secure feeling and you can check on things at home when your away!!

Reviews.Title: Simple, but the initial lens is not wide and you would not have a wide angle
Reviews.Author: Saeid Maghdouri
Reviews.Content: I would recommend to purchase it with a wide angle lens ( 2,8 mm or 4 mm) in this way you could have a suitable wide angle view

Reviews.Title: Avoid - known flicker issue that Foscam won't fix
Reviews.Author: The J Train
Reviews.Content: This would probably be a good camera if it didn't have the well known flicker problem (do a search) that Foscam either can't or won't fix. Foscam support simply ignores you if you complain so chances are that if you buy this camera and try to use it outdoors you'll be returning it. Best to try some other camera/manufacturer instead.

Reviews.Title: Worked for a whole week
Reviews.Author: Cletus0614
Reviews.Content: This camera worked for a whole week and quit.  Quality is not good, and it's flimsy right from the box.  Be careful of the antenna...touch it and it breaks.  Just spend the extra money for a better one.  You'll be happier in the end.  Trust me.

Reviews.Title: Horrible quality control and worthless warranty.  Don't buy!
Reviews.Author: K. Hales "brewmaster1957"
Reviews.Content: FOSCAM has discontinued this model, but I can tell you from experience that the QC at Foscam is non-existent.  The cameras have a very high failure rate and tend to go out about 4-6 months after purchase.  The most common event I have seen is that the camera can not be accessed with IP Camera Tool.  Without this tool, the camera is useless.  The chip inside the camera is not working correctly and this causes failure.  I have now gone through 3 cameras.  Now, let me tell you about FOSCAM's sneaky trick of not really covering you on the warranty.  After 30 days, you can NOT get a refund, no matter what.  However, you can send the camera back for a replacement that is a refurbished and defective model.  This costs about $20 using UPS and standard delivery.  Foscam then charges ANOTHER $10 to send a camera back to you that is probably going to fail again.Since I am on my third camera, my shipping costs now exceed $80 for defective cameras.  This is about the price of a new one.  The fine print of the "Warranty" does state that you have to pay $10 after a 30 day period.  I guess they have to make money somehow because if they didn't charge a fee, I am sure they would go bankrupt just from shipping new (Used and refurbished and defective) models back to you.I think the best thing is to stay away.  If you MUST have a FOSCAM, go to a local store like Wurst-Buy or Fall-Mart.  At least you can save shipping. Oh, be sure to buy extended protection because you WILL make your money back.Foscam is a lousy producer of crap Chinese (is there any other kind) cameras.  Your odds are VERY high you will experience a defective camera sometime in the next 5-12 months after purchase.Don't buy this product and do some shopping for a better camera with REAL warranty protection.

Reviews.Title: Good camera at a good price
Reviews.Author: Timothy R. Golik
Reviews.Content: Happy with the three cams to watch our cabin. Called in to tech support on different occasions to help with port forwarding / remote viewing.  Always helpful and able to remote in to get things running. Thanks Danny!

Reviews.Title: F18905W
Reviews.Author: Tombo
Reviews.Content: I returned this after installing under the 2nd floor eves for watching my driveway. I have a 3 car driveway, and the field of view for this cam was too narrow. Ordered the F18904W to replace it. The 18905W also seemed to have a weak wifi connection when being about 50' from my router. The F18905W was just as easy to set up as other Foscams. I have 3 internal cams that are working fine. Once you get one Foscam working, the rest are easy to add. The hardest part is port forwarding thru your router. There are lots of posts here to help you get set up. With my cams I have everything working including: port forwarding, email, dedicated PC to record motion-detected video, fixed IP, Dyndns, Android app. It takes some persistence to get it all working, since the documentation that comes with it is sparse.

Reviews.Title: Camera received with Bird poop on top of camera and cracked glass
Reviews.Author: Harry
Reviews.Content: Can you believe it or not that I received  a camera that has bird poop on top of the hood and a cracked glass covering IR LED's.I got the camera sold by FOSCAM and not by amazon. Terrible experience.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy!!
Reviews.Author: Jill R. Bodenhamer
Reviews.Content: These cameras won't even stay connected to a wireless router, you have to take them down and reconfigure them daily!! The picture that they give you for a few seconds is great but like I said it only lasts for a few seconds literally. Don't waste your money!I just hope that I can send them back.?.

Reviews.Title: Foscam cameras
Reviews.Author: Farmer Dan
Reviews.Content: For both the price and the quality these cameras can not be beat. The infrared is exceptional and during the day it is easy to adjust the brightness and contrast. We have over a half dozen which includes three different models and they all are working fine. The main thing is that you do need to have some comprehension of a computer and know that you will be taking some time to set them up correctly for your individual needs. Once that is done, you will have one very good system that for the money invested is very much worth it. The foscam software that comes with it, that has the multiple viewing, recording, etc...didn't like it so much. It was clunky to configure and was never able to figure out how to even get a live image from a camera on it. I purchased the Blue Iris software and after a few hours going over it and setting things up we were good to go. The LAN setup worked great and  it was very impressive. The next step was setting it up to be able to view it over the internet. This took some added time and was tricky in places, but again with perseverance it paid off and we now have it set up to vies from anywhere we can get an internet connection. I am happy with the cameras, the software, the image quality and the price. Those are all pluses. The time involved and knowing how to get around a computer would be the only cons. But again, with time and re-reading things in the manual and help file, these can be overcome. Overall we are very happy and I would recommend these cameras to friends and family without hesitation.

Reviews.Title: Unless your an IT expert - Good luck!
Reviews.Author: D. LLC "linkage"
Reviews.Content: Unless you are computer proficient - one word on setting this baby up: PONDEROUSWhoever wrote the manual - English was not their first language (for that matter - neither is the woman who speaks on the DVD).  Hopefully you know your router really well - if not - go dig out the manuals.I'm giving up until I have an entire afternoon to spend trying to figure this sucker out.  Your best bet is have a tech do it and save yourself aggravation.As far as the camera itself: very true as others have pointed out: This thing has a huger power cord you have to figure out how to enclose and protect from the elements unless your drilling holes in your walls, in which case - make this thing an annoying weekend project.

Reviews.Title: Ok but Could be ALOT better!
Reviews.Author: Jim Matyjasik
Reviews.Content: Flyingblind pretty much sums it up. The WIFI reception is pretty bad on this camera. You have to have the camera within 3 feet of an access point inorder to get normal speed out of the web UI and the camera picture. This cam can only be mounted from the bottom and must face right side up. The viewing angle is also pretty bad. Foscam can do a lot better with this cam.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: d.c. "dave of ca"
Reviews.Content: Works great, for the most part.  As soon as the day gets brighter or darker though the screen starts flashing repeatedly, setting off the camera's motion detection sensor and providing me with an endless stream of 'motion detected' emails until I turn off motion detection for a short bit.  Otherwise, I like it.

Reviews.Title: As described
Reviews.Author: Justin Perry
Reviews.Content: Everything works great. I have it watching my vehicles in the carport.  Bugs at night are a little annoying with the infrared, but overall great product.  Item as described.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: GLZ-1970
Reviews.Content: This camera is of poor quality. The first one I ordered was defective out of the box, I sent it back and Amazon replaced it with no hassles. The replacement lasted 7 months and has just died (continuously blinking IR lamps and interface is unavailable; rebooting and factory reseting have no effect). I also had another Foscam model, the FI8910w which died after 3 months. I enjoyed this camera very much while it worked, but I expect a longer life. You get what you pay for with the Foscam brand. They are good learner cameras for dipping your toe into IP Camera technology, but in the long run you are truly better off with a higher quality camera. Foscams for sale on amazon.com have inflated customer ratings due to the extensive use of shills.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Gary D. Morrow
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this camera. Good night vision. Keeps eye on my pool area and sends emails of pics when movement is detected

Reviews.Title: Poor image quality outdoors
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: Definitely not worth the money. Remote internet viewing did not work even after hours of setup and configuring. Will try a different Foscam model and hope the quality is better.

Reviews.Title: Overall Very Good - Narrow FOV
Reviews.Author: L.R. Murdock
Reviews.Content: PROS:  I thought it was easy to configure (have read other people say it is difficult)Night vision capabilities are very goodIR Cut filter provides good daytime color and nighttime contrastCONS:  Very narrow field of view (I already had the 6mm lens and replaced with a 4mm lens and it is still narrow)When IR CUT filter turns on or off, I always get a motion detection trigger event (I think this is common)FOSCAM does not have an official replacement antenna with higher sensitivity like they do for the indoor models.

Reviews.Title: Nice priced protection with good ir range.
Reviews.Author: rotwiler
Reviews.Content: The way my house is I cant see anything in my driveway, I did have a older black and white cam but decided to upgrade. IR night range is pretty good and daytime is clear, I would like more adjustment options, but it isn't a pro cam. My router is a pain(probably user error) so it isn't just plug and play for me, but I am using the wired connection and had been working great. I do need to remove front cover and fine tune the picture(had slight blur). I ended up buying the blue iris software which is much better and records when there is movement.

Reviews.Title: Foscam F18905 Outdoor Camera
Reviews.Author: WANDA  ARCHER
Reviews.Content: Item came packaged for safe delivery and as described and within time frame given for delivery.  I have it accessible to my smartphone and love the option of taking a peak around home when I am away.  This is a definite must.  Love it.

Reviews.Title: OK, for the price.
Reviews.Author: Bernie
Reviews.Content: The mount was very 'flimsy', bur the camera seems to be well built. I ended up using a different (heavy duty) camera mount. The resolution (640 x 480) isn't good enough. Also, for my purpose, the 6mm lense was not wide angle enough. I ended up buying a 4mm lense, to replace it.

Reviews.Title: Color washed out
Reviews.Author: Shurin Mtellnya "River Rat"
Reviews.Content: Color is washed out. Camera does not automatically switch from daytime to infrared nighttime viewing. Did not find setup to be easy.

Reviews.Title: Works, but ...
Reviews.Author: Johanna Ashbaugh
Reviews.Content: The set-up of this was a nightmare.  The installation instructions/video have so many grammar/spelling errors, it is laughable.  Made in China, product support in India.  Does not support Windows 7 and locks up my laptop if I use the IP Camera Tool.  It does, however, send me emails when motion is detected.  Worth what I paid for

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: jermie
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for some outside monitoring.  The night vision feature works good. But you get what you pay for. For a close up image this camera works good but dont expect to get great images at a distance. (thats what the $1000 + camera's are for) works good for home security and after figuring out about port forwarding it was pretty easy to install so that I can monitor the camera away from home using a smartphone.  The only issue that I had with the product was that the antenna was loose when purchased and after trying to secure multiple time it broke off.  I was able to buy a replacement antenna which seems to be sturdier.

Reviews.Title: Easy to mount  and easy to use
Reviews.Author: Alexey
Reviews.Content: I liked this camera, but not sure will I extend home cctv system with this brand or find something better. Mounting was easy, except drilling big hole in the wall, because Ethernet  plug is quite big. I'd prefer to have LAN socket on the camera, protected with rubber and shell against rain rather have this bulky plug. I used this only once for configuration in my network and now it's hanging on the wall. It's good plug if you going to use in wired network.Another thing I found- it doesn't allow me to use their own DDNS service. This camera comes with own UID marked on the camera, but their service rejects my requests. The solution is  to use alternative DDNS service or static IP.I was surprised with night vision- it's really good, even in the full dark. But unwanted person will see your camera in dark as well, because infrared leds have a weak red light.It's easy to configure as well, works both from MAC and PC , also from Symbian and Android phones, iOS devices -iPod, iPAD. But only in Windows environment it allows continuously to record video stream (using ActiveX in IE). Other browsers have "Push mode" only.Resolution is a quite low, don't expect to see emotions on people faces, only essential shapes and it doesn't have mic , but I assume for this price is normal. I'd recommend this camera for anyone who is looking  for their first surveillance wireless camera.

Reviews.Title: Foscams Working Great
Reviews.Author: VixJam
Reviews.Content: First off: this is a totally legit review--this is my first review ever but Scott at Foscam encouraged me to write.  I bought 5 foscams (3 inside, 2 outdoor) and was stumped on how to see them over the internet.  Scott not only got all 5 working over the net (WITH AUDIO), but also got them set up on my Foscam Blue Iris software so I can record video with my PC.  We have our first baby coming in about a week and we are going to use Foscams for baby monitoring, nanny watching, and home security.  Everything working perfectly now thanks to the awesome support from Scott at Foscam.  Over an hour and twenty minutes on the phone but worth every minute and EVERY PENNY!

Reviews.Title: Great service
Reviews.Author: Florida Resident
Reviews.Content: Thanks for the great tech support in setting up the wireless connection!Looking forward to buying more cameras.Thanks alot  Foscam

Reviews.Title: Monster Cam
Reviews.Author: Ace Hex
Reviews.Content: For the money I have to give these cameras 5 stars.  I've have  a couple Trendnet cams and some inexpensive Swann cams and this camera has the best image capabilities by far.  True the camera is larger then most but it has a pile of leds that shine out to nearly 100 feet at night.  One drawback is there is no way to manually turn them off at night if your situation would warrant it. They are automatically controlled by a photo cell ONLY.  Oh - btw the included camera mount is somewhat under designed for the size of this camera. I had to beef it up to securely hold the camera.  Wireless capabilities seem quite adequate - for me it was a very easy to set up but I have quite a bit of experience with wireless networks.  I broke down and bought Blue  Iris software (sold by Foscam) to control all my cameras.  If you have 3 or more cameras - especially if they are of different brands/etc you might want to consider this software.  Pretty fancy program - but there is a learning curve with it and of course you will need to leave one of your computers on all the time to run the program in the background.  NOW well see how long the camera lasts out in the elements.

Reviews.Title: great fixed cam for the money
Reviews.Author: gene
Reviews.Content: well built wireless security cam for fixed use.Similar quality to other inexpensive Foscam models.Multiple mounting options supplied on top and bottom.

Reviews.Title: Faulty Product
Reviews.Author: John H Clark
Reviews.Content: This product had two major faults.  The lens could not be properly focused.  The focusing procedure requires disassembly of the camera and tinkering.  Despite following the procedure I was never able to get a proper focus.  Then night came.  The IR capability of this camera did not work at all.  After purchase I researched other reviews.  It seems the IR issue is a common problem.  It seems that the manufacturer has no quality control.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Best Buy, Best Product, Best Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Joel R Klein
Reviews.Content: I have 2 Webcams connected Wireless to my home IP Network.  Both work excellently and when I have IP connectivity problems I call Customer Service and they are EXCELLENT.

Reviews.Title: Good camera but viewing angle is limited
Reviews.Author: ECHO444
Reviews.Content: I purchased a variety of indoor/outdoor Foscam cameras for my home. The 8905W is a great camera for outdoor use with pretty decent night vision. The software is not plug-n-play but with a little patience it isn't that difficult to set up. The only issue I have with this camera is the 22 degree viewing angle .... it is pretty limited, there is a model just up from this one that offers a 55 degree angle for a few dollars more. Overall I'm fairly satisfied ... I'l likely end up putting this one in the back and buying the 55 degree to cover a larger area for the front.

Reviews.Title: Foscam FI9821w IP Cameras and Technical Support
Reviews.Author: CT Maddox "Latteman"
Reviews.Content: I purchased FI9821w cameras from Foscam and used their Technical Support to help me get the cameras functioning correctly. Calvin was very helpful. He even opened the appropriate Amazon window for me and encouraged me to leave this feedback even though I purchased through Foscam directly!

Reviews.Title: FOSCAM SECURITY CAMERA
Reviews.Author: MARYANNE MARKIEWICZ
Reviews.Content: JUST GOT A FOSCAM SECURITY CAMERA IN AND IT WORKS PERFECTLY!!!! I LIKE HOW YOU CAN HOOK IT UP TO THE CAMERA AND VIEW IT FROM ANYWHERE!..ALSO  CALLED CUSTOMER SUPPORT AND TALKED TO Sandra Williams AND WHAT A WONDERFUL HELP!!!! WOULD RECOMMEND THIS CAMERA TO ANYONE!!

Reviews.Title: This is a GREAT camera !!
Reviews.Author: Brad Foster
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these for a project for my neighbor and I. I installed one pointing at his house across the street and then I installed one pointing at my house. Now we have a neighborhood watch going and these are excellent for long shots, like across the street. The night vision is fantastic and again this model is great for long distances. Look for a wider angle lens for an outdoor close proximity view if that is what you are looking for. Would highly recommend !!

Reviews.Title: technical support
Reviews.Author: brugby
Reviews.Content: I bought my second foscam camera from you.The camera is terrific and the technical support to install the camera was perfect. Felix was great and very helpful and professional. I needed help with yhe wireless and remote access and he did it all.

Reviews.Title: Customer service is wonderful; cameras defective
Reviews.Author: Chaplin
Reviews.Content: Christina spent two hours with me working on how to get the camera up and running. The camera works with Internet Explorer, not so well with Firefox. She worked very hard and then everything worked when it was wired to the router. But only one camera worked wirelessly and then it did not pick up anything outside. I called Customer Service again, got a different rep, who told me that the concentric white rings blotting out most of the view were fog. On an outside camera. Forget it; they're going back. Maybe it's because I use Firefox, but the directions say we can use Firefox.

Reviews.Title: Never Worked Correctly!
Reviews.Author: Brendi Lorisch
Reviews.Content: My husband worked in Security and still does in higher capacity, however, he could not Get it to work properly!It would not connect as stated. We use as a prop in the window!!

Reviews.Title: Not bad but not satisfied
Reviews.Author: Erick
Reviews.Content: Ordered the product in February 2013 its now April 26 and has stopped working, not a big fan of the 22 deg viewing angle but while the camera was working the quality was great. But it seams the product must have been defective.... Will be contacting the seller soon and keep you up to date.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Technical support
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: I own several of the Foscam cameras. I had an issue with the cameras maintaining the IP address for my port forwarding. I contacted the FOSCAM technical support and they were able to log into my computer and fix the problem. They also instructed me on some other issues. Great folks and I highly recommend them and their cameras.

Reviews.Title: foscam  Mod: F18910W review
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: After recieving your model F18910W indoor camera as a gift I contacted Foscam support and was directed to tecnician Sarah, she connected my new camera so that it would work wirelessley. this only took a few minutes and was done in a very professional manner. thanks Sarah. you did an excellent job.

Reviews.Title: Help with the wireless set up.
Reviews.Author: Nvoltz
Reviews.Content: This was my second time calling FOSCAM, the first I was on hold for about 45 minutes never the less their quality of service is excellent. Kate answered all of my questions quickly and once I asked for help with the wireless setup she took over through team viewer and explained as she was doing so. I make it a habit of calling the manufactures that I'm going to do business with before I make a commitment to the brand and by the service I got today I'm going to go ahead and order 16 of their FW8905 cameras. I'm confident that won't be a fly-by-night business that will abandon their technology like Airlink101 did to me. I recommend everyone to call their support you will be impressed!Thank you Kate,Paul

Reviews.Title: technical start up support
Reviews.Author: don
Reviews.Content: A lot of patience ion getting the settings properly set and additional help in providing easy access both with my MacAir as well as mi I phone.  Felix was most patient and very knowledgeable, solvedall problems quickly.

Reviews.Title: Great Service
Reviews.Author: John Turcotte
Reviews.Content: Purchased Foscam FI8905W and had to configure for two phones and two laptops. Had some difficulty with setup but was able to quickly resolve through the help of Albert the customer service tech. Works great on IPhone and Android. Found it was easy to do port forwarding and love the wireless feature. Went ahead and purchased a second cam.

Reviews.Title: Service and remote setup
Reviews.Author: Mr C Gassner
Reviews.Content: The setup and controlled manner in which this service was carried out was without exception professional, my thanks to Harry Foster for his patience and understanding.I had two camera's the 04w and the 05w.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Outdoor Cam
Reviews.Author: Billy C. Power "kosmickuntryboy"
Reviews.Content: Very well made products. Absolutely not a problem to setup and use. Phone techsupport outstanding.Would reccomend very highly. Get yours today.

Reviews.Title: Foscam FI8910W - so far so good.
Reviews.Author: rjd949c
Reviews.Content: I have had a difficult time going through in home security cameras.  I've had one that worked good for a while, then quit, sent multiple false alarm emails (I'm talking hundreds per day), etc.  Even after repair or replacement they would do the same thing.  I've also had cameras that I couldn't get to work from the start.  Not even the company's support could get it to work.  I was then recommended FOSCAM and after a little over a month, I'm still happy.  Not only does the camera work great and have a great picture, they have excellent customer support.  When you call, if there is a wait, the IVR continuously updates how many calls are in front of you and the estimated wait time.  I recently had an issue where my IP Viewer for my cell phone stopped working.  I called and Sandra Williams knew what needed to be done and got is working again.  I would recommend this product not only because it functions well, but because they have excellent support.

Reviews.Title: Tec Support
Reviews.Author: Jasper N Watson jr
Reviews.Content: The person was very helpful and was able in a short time to resolve the problems I was having.The product now woking and I believe it will give me the service I will expect!

Reviews.Title: Foscam Camera
Reviews.Author: CF
Reviews.Content: I have been happy with my outdoor Foscam camera. We now have two. The best part is the customer service. They are extremely helpful in connecting and troubleshooting the cameras. She even connected me to view my camera on email.Foscam FI8905W Outdoor Wireless/Wired IP/Network Camera with 30 Meter Night Vision and 6mm Lens (22° Viewing Angle) - Silver

Reviews.Title: 18904w working well!
Reviews.Author: Sharee Rivera "sharita"
Reviews.Content: Harry Foster at support spent almost an hour trying to correct my camera issue.  i had changed the gateway channel due to slow response on my other devices as per the cable provider.  this then caused my camera to not work wirelessly.  the problem was communicated to Harry who then signed on to my computer and took control of the issue until it was fixed.  i am very happy with this product as well as the technical support provided by Harry Foster and Foscam in general.  their website is also very user friendly and has alot of self help tools. i am also very pleased at being able to view this camera from my phone.  it gives me piece of mind.

Reviews.Title: Foscam IP Camera
Reviews.Author: A. Patel
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera. Easy to set up and works great.The tech support is awesome. The tech support specialist (Calvin) help me to set it up wirelessly.It ROCKS!!!!

Reviews.Title: Technical support
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased two additional foscam cameras and needed assistance hooking them up to my router. Felix, the gentleman helping me, was very helpful and connected them in a timely manner. I recommend Foscam to others looking for IP cameras.

Reviews.Title: What a hunk of junk
Reviews.Author: Patrick
Reviews.Content: Camera seemed to work okay after I set it up (resolution was a little low, but I expected that).  However, when I went to install it, the antenna broke right off.  Can't imagine how this thing is supposed to weather the elements if it's that flimsy.  It no longer sends picture at all.  Complete waste of money.

Reviews.Title: best camera ever
Reviews.Author: joe marco
Reviews.Content: Yes, this camera really works!  it is easy to use and if you have trouble connecting the techs at Foscam will be more than glad to help you out. These people know what they are doing.The camera is very intuitive to use. It has great color definition and the night time features are unmatched. Thank you Foscam!

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Michael Macys
Reviews.Content: Not the easiest to set up, used google to help but I'm not a tech guy. Now that it's set up I get an email to my phone with the picture of whoever set it off. It is clear and a great system. I love this.

Reviews.Title: Easy setup
Reviews.Author: Richard L. Ensley
Reviews.Content: No problems setting it up,covers area I wanted good day and night.It would br better with an easier mounting system.I ended up mounting the camera and bracket to a small piece of wood with pre-drilled screw holes and then mounted to underside of roof overhang.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera and value
Reviews.Author: Grandma Meer "Maripat"
Reviews.Content: Plus good online tech service to help with setup.  Video quality is quite good and the IR feature is a welcome benefit.Thanks, Calvin!Dave

Reviews.Title: foscam support
Reviews.Author: Lori
Reviews.Content: The service was fast and greatSimon was very helpful in getting me setup.The camera has great features and its a wonderful product.

Reviews.Title: foscam support
Reviews.Author: Ace
Reviews.Content: Great camera and good support from Foscam.  Would recommend it to anyone tha tis looking for an IR capable camera.

Reviews.Title: FOSCAM TECH REP SUPPORT
Reviews.Author: ANTHONY RUSSO
Reviews.Content: THE TECH REP SUPPORT FOR FOSCAM SECURITY CAMERA WAS EXCELLENT....I WILL BUY FROM THEM AGAIN, AS WELL AS ADVISE OTHERS TO DO THE SAME

Reviews.Title: set up cameras
Reviews.Author: Patrick Wyatt
Reviews.Content: It was my pleasure to have Calvin work with me today to set up my two camera. He was very patient and knowledgable to work with and his English was very good so that I could understand him. He made the whole experience a joy and got me up and running in a very short period of time. The cameras are everything I expected and I can't wait to get the necessary passwords to get my I-Phone tied in to this system. Calvin changed me from a very frustrated customer to a very pleased one and I will now not hesitate to buy other Foscam products in the future.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Camera and Customer Service
Reviews.Author: bic
Reviews.Content: The foscam camera works great and the customer service helped me get it set up.  Nice program to quickly adjust my computer setting and the camera setting to get them working.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera, it takes a little time to set up but once you do its great. Great for the outdoors

Reviews.Title: Camera Set-up ( Foscam F19802w )
Reviews.Author: Michael Harvey "Mike Harvey"
Reviews.Content: Although it took a long time to get everything set up the camera did do all the features I asked for. The tech. support was courteous and knowledgable although the foreign accent was hard to understand at times.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera so far
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera up for only 24 hours but LOVE it thus far. Excellent Excellent zero light illumination. I  purchased this to view my snowmobiles so they dont get stolen again. The camera software to setup email alerts with snapshots on motion seems a little finicky, but that may just be me finding the right "sweet" spot. (256 motion alerts in 6 hours) a bit too sensitive yet! But I love that it can do it. Gmail can be used for the email account, but It seems very picky, but that appears to be gmail not the camera.I will say the mount that comes in the box seems like its too light weight to properly handle this camera. The camera keeps wanting to slowly drift downward even after tightening with pliers.Image quality is amazing for the  price. I have another foscam camera that I love, but it's quality is half of this one. I will be putting up more of this model, and eventually replacing the other one with another one of this model.I'd recommend a heavier duty mount be purchased.  It's just too weak and flakey.Overall I do recommend purchasing this camera if you need a decent camera with night viewing for a good price.

Reviews.Title: Great Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Dee
Reviews.Content: Great Customer Service! The Infered feature is excellent on the camera!  Well worth the money for 70 dollars. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Service
Reviews.Author: zena3546 "zena3546"
Reviews.Content: I have now purchased 3 cameras and called the tech support number. They have helped set up all the camera's to be wireless and then for port forwarding to watch online. Sandra Williams helped me and she did a fantastic job! Love having the support on something I could not figure out myself. Ordering another camera to install as well. THANK YOU FOSCAM!!

Reviews.Title: support
Reviews.Author: Darrell
Reviews.Content: Calvin helped us get the cameras up and running with remote access. Our FI9821W works  and provides us with remote acces to our home while we travel. Thank you Foscam for great products.

Reviews.Title: Foscam
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: Very good support for internet multi camera, person stayed on line until fixed, very good for user, and i am not very experienced

Reviews.Title: foscam support
Reviews.Author: kelsey
Reviews.Content: I called to set up the remote access and the tech support was awesome! Super fast and easy set up and now my camera is working great! They also set up the audio for me and you don't even need seperate speakers.

Reviews.Title: Foscam support
Reviews.Author: papagaai "papagaai"
Reviews.Content: Nice camera (F19821W), which has a really good night picture.  Very impressed. Got a bit lost in the set up, especially as I wanted it to work on my iPhone, but the Foscam Tech support was really good and had everything done quickly.

Reviews.Title: great foscam support
Reviews.Author: kiran
Reviews.Content: this camera is a great camera and value price for everything it has to offer. The tech support was also great and you dont get the run around like most companies!! I would 100percent tell everyone if they need a ip cam to buy this band foscam!!!

Reviews.Title: good resolution for an inexpensive camera
Reviews.Author: erie_guy
Reviews.Content: Camera was difficult to set up using only the enclosed instructions.  However, support from Foscam was easily obtained and the camera is now working as expected.

Reviews.Title: Narrow view angle
Reviews.Author: R. Yang
Reviews.Content: As other people already provided great detail review, this camera has narrow view angle. If you install it directly above your garage door to monitor your driveway and you park your car on your driveway, you will only see a portion of your car.With its price, this is a great camera. Very easy to setup and view from the internet.

Reviews.Title: Fi8905w
Reviews.Author: Mikhail Ayzerov
Reviews.Content: I purchased 2 Foscam FI8905w cameras a few month ago. After wild one of the  camera stop working. The explorer couldn't recognize the camera. I called the company to replace the camera. Then I decide to call to Foscam technical support first before sending camera back. When i called to technical support i got wery welcome and warm communication with LEO. He fixed the problem and i am very appriciate this becouse he saved my time and money. Hi did this in very profesional way.

Reviews.Title: Foscam FI8910W  - Great camera
Reviews.Author: Kelly
Reviews.Content: I have two of these cameras and they are wonderful. I was not able to set them up myself so I called their support and was able to be up and running in no time.  Recently, I had to call them again to have my cameras set up after I had my wireless router replaced.  Their  customer support person Sandra was able to get my cameras up and running in no time!  SO - don't worry if you have no skill in setting up things wirelessly and for remote viewing - they will help you get it done in no time.  Also, I have never had to be on hold waiting for support for over 2 minutes. Very pleased with the product and support.Kelly

Reviews.Title: Great  Camera
Reviews.Author: Michael Kleinberg
Reviews.Content: Sandra Williams from tech support solved my E-Mail problem, she resolved it pretty fast, since I worked in tech support I know what professionalism is, and she has that.

Reviews.Title: Great Help
Reviews.Author: Harold Donnelly
Reviews.Content: Sandra Williams was a great help with setting up my FOSCAM Camera.She was extremely efficient and very knownledgable.She was able to help me set up my cell phone also.

Reviews.Title: Dont buy it for night shots
Reviews.Author: Justin L. Orrell
Reviews.Content: Very disappointed, so much that I sent the camera back. Its so washed out at night you couldnt use the image to identify who or what was goind on. So that basically makes it useless for me.

Reviews.Title: Great Foscam Support
Reviews.Author: Barry
Reviews.Content: The Foscam is a superior product if you want a babycam. The service dept. was first rate and solved all of my problems. I would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: foscam support
Reviews.Author: Binh Nguyen

Reviews.Title: foscam
