Reviews.Title: 2 down
Reviews.Author: Stephen W. Cox "West"
Reviews.Content: For unknown reasons, the two cameras I received would not work in my home computer system.  Both times I called customer service and gave them remote control of my computer and router.  They could not get the cameras to work. I have another camera from this company, an indoor model, that works fine.  It's very possible that the problem lies within my home computer system and not with Foscam, but I won't be buying any more unless a fix is found.  3/29/13 follow-up.  It was in fact a problem with my router.  I replaced the router and solved the problem.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Cameras
Reviews.Author: william
Reviews.Content: had a hard time to hook the cameras up my self but got technical help to do so and now they work awesome. I like that I can view multiple cameras at once with sound

Reviews.Title: Didn't like it very much
Reviews.Author: Mosiny
Reviews.Content: The angle for this camera is not very wide. It is for watching longer distances. I had problems connecting it to my home wireless Internet, sometimes it would work sometimes it wouldn't. I ended up returning the camera, the indoor foscam is way better than this one. Amazon made it really easy for me returning this item.

Reviews.Title: tech support
Reviews.Author: Ekayak
Reviews.Content: Tech support called me back and fixed the problem easily...very helpful. Thanks!Camera works well...need to spend a bit of time setting up, but otherwise works well day and night.Easily connects to my iPhone, if needed.Can be used to setup wirelessly to computer and can forward images to gmail account.

Reviews.Title: good cam; bad mount
Reviews.Author: Bill Barrick
Reviews.Content: just so you know... setting this up requires a fairly geeky talent. while it's not command line it's the next step up. "friendly" user interface is not descriptive. the big problem (and unfortunately the return window passed before we got around to mounting this) is that the camera mount is incredibly fragile. just finger tightening the ball arm resulting in sheering off the screw twice. And Foscam doesn't sell parts as far as I can tell from their Web site and according to one blogger.This is not fatal, I've ordered a $7 adjustable camera mount and it should work but just sayin'

Reviews.Title: Smart phone access
Reviews.Author: Lewis Olson
Reviews.Content: I have not had time to explore all the options but so far so good, it is performing as intended.  We use it to monitor an elderly mother-in-law when we cannot be in the room.  I could not get my Samsung SIII to connect to the camera.  The quick fix was to simply turn off the wi fi.  I could not understand the technical reason but it connected immediately with wifi off.

Reviews.Title: help w/ remote hook up
Reviews.Author: cwsqeeg
Reviews.Content: Foscam Fl8910whelp by sandra to help hook up remote settings with camerashe was great in helping me to get it on my tablether service was great and if the camera lives up to her service i sure i will be happy.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Support
Reviews.Author: Martin
Reviews.Content: I just purchased this item and am very impressed.  The customer service department was very helpful in setting up the camera.  The quality of the product is very good for the price.  I would recommend this camera to anyone interested in a home montitoring system.

Reviews.Title: foscam camera support
Reviews.Author: megan
Reviews.Content: The service was good i got all my questions answered .The cameras are very good , what ever you dont understand about them you can call the tech. support.

Reviews.Title: service from foscam by sandra
Reviews.Author: clark
Reviews.Content: Sandra  did and excellent job helping me get camera set up  the foscam is  a great camera especially for the price  could not ask for more

Reviews.Title: motion images/video is very dissappointing
Reviews.Author: for your consideration
Reviews.Content: Firstly, I immediately updated the firmware to the latest based on my research prior to my purchase. The update process was flawless (make sure to do it from a wired connection). The configuration process was relatively easy as well. The "IP Camera Tool" software (included with the camera) used to locate the camera(s) on the network works very well and web browser interaction (SeaMonkey, Firefox, and Internet Explorer) worked equally as well (both wired and wireless).The Foscam forums have a wealth of helpful information. I especially appreciated the topic(s) discussing how to disable the embedded My.Foscam.org DDNS setting in the firmware configuration. This is otherwise not configurable through the normal user interface (UI). Really, must this be a default with the inability to simply disable it? The not-so-savvy users could open the cam for full viewing by the general public if they are not careful. Read more about this in the post at: [...]Update: Amazon will not post the link, so just go to the Foscam forum and search for "Security Concern with MyFoscam.org".As for the image quality, the clearest can be acquired at 320x240 (rather small). The only other option is 640x480 which is a bit grainy. Static images are easily recognizable, even at night with the infra-red LEDs lighting the scene. However, motion video at either of these resolutions leaves a lot to be desired. Motion is very blurry and infrequently identifiable. In my experience with these cameras and other multiple Foscam's I bought here (FI8910W and FI8905W), I found this to be the case with video and snapshot stills when motion is in the scene. Basically, if you know who/what it is, then you can probably identify it, but good luck with an unexpected/uninvited guest. I believe this to be an inherent weakness in the camera design and a detriment when using these for home surveillance.Another note on the infra-red LEDs: they emit a red glow in the dark or low-light environments. Therefore, they are not really suited for concealment and can easily be spotted.  They also have other bright power and network activity LEDs on them as well.  While the network LED can be shut off in the software, the power LED cannot. With these on the front they happily announce their presence to any would-be intruder (day or night - which I realize is moot given the aforementioned red-glow).As for the other CMS (Central Management Software) software included with the camera(s), it does work but it is not without its own quirks. -- For one thing, CMS *MUST* be run with *Administrator* privileges in Windows (I use Win7 Pro). Otherwise, it cannot be properly configured for use with the cameras. So, right-mouse-click the icon and select "Run as administrator". This is a software design flaw which could have been overcome by incorporating other methods. -- Once configured, I found CMS to be clunky and sluggish when controlling cameras. I had eight of them setup and it was painful to remotely operate them. With two or three configured it was more manageable. And I am running this on a very powerful Intel-based core-i7 PC at 3.5GHz!In the end, I am disappointed with my investment and may opt to return/replace these cameras.

Reviews.Title: Very nice wireless camera! Works Great
Reviews.Author: Marcus
Reviews.Content: This is my second camera from Foscam after buying the FI8904W. The camera is easy to install, set up, and mount.Notes:The camera is better for longer distances, hallways, yards, and distances more than 10 feet. It is clearer than the 4W and I recommend getting the 4W for front door cams and this one for larger areas.Set Up:Plug the Ethernet cord in to install the camera after installing the software. Do the complete set up with it plugged in and you'll have quicker results. This camera, my second, took less than five minutes to set up on my network. Make sure to change the port to 8090, 8091, and so on for better access on your network. You may notice, especially if you have Comcast your ISP will change all connected devices IP addresses randomly, disconnecting your camera from your tablet and phones. To fix this, log on to your routers by typing in the URL on the router manual and change the internet signal to "Static", this will prevent IP addresses from changing.  Oh, be sure to waterproof all cords by taping with electrical tape prior to installing and enjoy.I plan on purchasing at least two more cameras. Great Product!

Reviews.Title: Good first impression
Reviews.Author: benjaminw
Reviews.Content: Out of the box, this device connected to the LAN and functioned properly.  Wireless setup was a breeze, as was email setup.  Out of the several similar IP cam's I've tested from Loftek, Wansview, Agasio, etc., this camera has left me with the best immediate impression.  The web interface functions properly and the grammar and vocabulary seem to be superior to competing interfaces where the translations aren't quite on.  Like many have commented, the picture angle is incredibly narrow, and I look forward to installing the "Monoprice 1/3-inch 4mm IR F1.2 Fixed Iris CS Mount" alternative lens.  FYI- running over my wireless network, a nighttime IR stream is using ~2.7Mbit bandwidth (push, not active X in Chrome).

Reviews.Title: If you are mediocre on technology to setup, this is a great surveillance camera
Reviews.Author: ZuluNiner
Reviews.Content: Camera is built strong and everything is so far working well.Pros:1. IP camera has capability to send emails with motion detection.2. Login with your Smart Phone and view the camera real-time via browser3. If you can obtain Public IP to your home or Business, you can watch it from the internet anywhere4. Large lens with excellent night vision IR.Cons:1. Setup requires some knowledge of technology and computer firewalls ( anti-virus software firewall restricted camera )2. Viewing area is limited, however, for me it was satisfactory for the door.Enjoy knowing the vermins who is at your door soliciting or snatching your packages!!!

Reviews.Title: barn camera
Reviews.Author: Deadra
Reviews.Content: Had a difficult time getting the camera on internet but with the help of Foscam tech support i was up and running in no time. i am very please with my camera.

Reviews.Title: Video Flickering Problems
Reviews.Author: M. Whitley
Reviews.Content: I'm using this camera with a Synology disk station surveillance package. It worked ok for a couple of days then the video started flickering dark and light. This causes a motion alarm in the Synology software and also in the built in software for the camera. I've upgraded to the latest firmware and it is still a problem. I searched the foscam problem and other users are having the same issue.

Reviews.Title: Foscam - great customer service
Reviews.Author: Alym Rayani
Reviews.Content: Camera works great, very good value and customer service was excellent in helping me set it up to view it remotely.  Calvin was extremely helpful, I will probably buy more cameras in the future.recommended for security, remote viewing and good pan/tilt features.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Support
Reviews.Author: Thomas A. Passerella
Reviews.Content: Received excellent support from Foscam.  Representative had excellent professional demeanor and was very quick to understand my problem.  Remotely set up my camera with no issues.  Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: john's review
Reviews.Author: john mio
Reviews.Content: I love the camera.  It was the right price and does a great job.Now the bad news.  I have had problems accessing the camera remotely and have purchased a host name on no-ip.now good news again... all of you tech support people have been courteous and helpful.  Every time I call them I get patience and results.Thanks for selling a great productMy best idea for improvement would be to make the remote access easyier to setup.

Reviews.Title: the BEST baby monitors out
Reviews.Author: SigTau19
Reviews.Content: I purchased 2 of these cams for my wife for X-mas so that she would be able to see our baby while she is traveling on the road.  They have been great, she was in Cali and was able to see our daughters first step!!!  They are pretty easy to set-up and if you have any problems just give there tech support a call and they can do everything for you!!!  Would I recomend these to parents?  YES!!!!  Hands down the best baby monitor out!!!  Thanks FosCam

Reviews.Title: Foscam
Reviews.Author: Stylus Soft Touch Pen for Toshiba Thrive
Reviews.Content: The Features i LikeMotion Detection,Remote Settings,Wireless,Video&Audio; Settings.My issue was logging onto the internet & operating wireless function.Tech support was very patient and helpful.I will suggest this camera to other customers as well as my family and friends.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Adam
Reviews.Content: Foscam IP Cameras are awesome for the price. I am not big on CCTV cameras, when I can have IP stuff integrated to my network.I recommend reserving the IP address for the device if you are using DHCP.Blue Iris software made and Sold by Foscam and Amazon for $50 bucks is great. It managed numerous cameras of different brands, keeps as much or as little video you want. I keep 10 days work on a NAS device I bought.

Reviews.Title: Foscam FI8910W
Reviews.Author: Robert O. Oberkrom
Reviews.Content: I really like this cam and its features with the exception that there is no zoom available on it. It is fairly easy to hook up and view from anywhere.

Reviews.Title: Reliable camera
Reviews.Author: pitch
Reviews.Content: The camera does exactly what I need it to do. The price point on this camera is more than fair, the IR does provide enough light for more than 60 feet in my application. Feature wise there isn't much it lacks. I will order more of this model.

Reviews.Title: Foscam tech support/camera
Reviews.Author: Joemarco
Reviews.Content: I had this camera for about a week and it is nothing short of amazing!. I was able to figure out how to make it work inside the network and it looks great. I even has an easy way to listen to your subject and talk if you want to, or not.When I went to connect to the internet it was way over my head. So I called Foscam Tech support and they called me back in a few minutes. The nice gentleman took over my computer and configured all the parameters in the router as well as the Comcast Modem....not an easy thing to do.Thanks to all at Foscam.Joe Marco, Florida.

Reviews.Title: tech support
Reviews.Author: Henry
Reviews.Content: Albert Pearson provided excellent installation support remotely!  All six cameras now work wirelessly and can be easily accessed from locations outside my network.  Picture quality is excellent.  No more grainy faces.  Will update the review for night vision, etc. after the cameras have been installed. Again, Albert was very patient and provided excellent service. I will be recommending the camera to all who are looking for quality, affordable security cameras.

Reviews.Title: Broken antenna when it arrived
Reviews.Author: MH
Reviews.Content: Bought this and a Foscam FI8918 camera at the same time. This one had a broken antenna lying in the bottom of the box. The other model has pan/tilt functions and the unit will not pan left so it is locked all the way to the right. It also had a defective CD that had visual defects and could not be recognized by the PC. On the bright side the cameras are easy to setup. As of right now, I would not reccomend Foscam but will give them a chance and update my reviews accordingly as the problems are taken care of.

Reviews.Title: Does its job
Reviews.Author: J
Reviews.Content: Understand this is not for close ups, long range outdoor. I have two of these mounted facing down both sides of driveway towards the street, about 60'. They send me emails of pics taken with movement, so I see all passing people/vehicles day or night. Large array of ir lights works good at night and works as a deterrent because the red bulbs can be seen from the front and people know they are on camera. mounted under a covered area so I cannot comment on reliability if completely exposed to outdoor elements. Initially setting up a foscam camera can be technically challenging but once yo do one camera the others are easy, mostly copy and paste from one setup to the other. I have many foscams setup around the house and am very satisfied with the value/performance for my needs.

Reviews.Title: Tech support
Reviews.Author: F. S. Tailby "Dottysdesigns"
Reviews.Content: Fast delivery and camera is perfect for my need, very happy,.great support with setting up remote access from the suppliers when called.This is the best infrared camera for the price I have seen.

Reviews.Title: Foscam fi8910
Reviews.Author: Marc
Reviews.Content: Setting up the cameras on the wifi was a breeze.  Needed help from tech support for the port forwarding though.  Sandra (tech support) was very helpful and kind!  Great customer service.

Reviews.Title: Foscam camera review
Reviews.Author: Granite Transformations
Reviews.Content: Easy setup...for home connection. Customer support very helpful. Setup my online access quickly. I do not like the 5.99 charge for the app from App store.Camera has quick response to commands.

Reviews.Title: Auxilliary camera - wish I'd bought more of them!
Reviews.Author: E. Solch
Reviews.Content: I'm ordering 2 more of these today. Popped it out of the box, attached it to my router via cable, configured it, switched it to wireless mode and it came right up. Decent video for the price. Infrared is great - I use it to watch my horses in a barn some distance away from my house.

Reviews.Title: Foscam FI18910W Camera - Love It!!!
Reviews.Author: beerad
Reviews.Content: I got a Foscam indoor camera last year for indoor use and the gentleman helped me set it up with my smartphone.  I liked it so much I got 3 more - one FI8910W and two outdoor F18904Ws. I'm not the most technically proficient so when I ran into issues and contacted their customer support, they were very courteous and helpful and walked me right through the setup (in other words, Sandra remoted in and did it for me).  All 4 cameras are now set up and I'm a very satisfied customer.Thank you Foscam!!!

Reviews.Title: Fair at best
Reviews.Author: Ld81
Reviews.Content: Construction is good and solid. Picture is fair at best. Not that clear, and yes I did take it down and focus it. There are better options available. I would not buy this camera again.

Reviews.Title: Buyer Beware
Reviews.Author: G. Patten
Reviews.Content: The Camera is a Chinese piece of crap. The set up wiring must be left outside with the camera making the camera look like a cheap install. Yes it works but it's clunky. Buyer Beware!

Reviews.Title: so-so...
Reviews.Author: J0ny Dzine
Reviews.Content: OK resolution, OK night vision.On really cold nights the system has reset and I've had to reset from default settings next day and re-acquire the network.A little bit annoying. Not sure how "weatherproof" it is...

Reviews.Title: Great cameras and technical support
Reviews.Author: Maté Afficionado
Reviews.Content: I purchased three Foscam cameras model # F18918 for our home through Foscam.us which provides unlimited FREE technical support for the product. I highly recommend these cameras for the following reasons:1. Infrared technology: Ensures great resolution in complete darkness.2. Free tech support3. App stores sell a cellphone app for $1.99 that links to your camera system in real-time for ultimate peace of mind.4. Mail service settings on your router are easily configured so that your email will be pinged if motion is detected from your cameras and photos are automatically taken and sent to your email. The alarm service settings will be set up as part of the free technical support that you receive with the cameras.5. Cameras have audio, pan and tilt features that can be remotely accessed and changed through the $1.99 app. It can even work as a crude international telephone (audio is sub-optimal but hey, it's free).6. Tech support has always been able to resolve my issues.I set up lithium battery backup so, should the thief cut the power supply, these cameras will still work. Basically, I have a superb alarm system that I do not have to pay a monthly fee. Also, the security companies tend to take several minutes to call the police in the event of a break in. When you get the email, you know and can call it yourself immediately. So, in my estimation, it is cheaper AND better.There are a couple of downsides but they're not insuperable:1. You need to be patient and have enough time when you call tech support. They can take a while to answer the phone. You can call sales and request that they call tech support and they will call you back but the call back can take some time, too.2. You CANNOT set up an email address with free email services (yahoo, gmail, etc) just for the cameras because it will recognize the emails as spam if you get too many motion detection emails per day. With most paid email servers, you simply put your email in your address book and it will obviate the spam settings.

Reviews.Title: Kate was Great!
Reviews.Author: jzapapas
Reviews.Content: Kate was quick, efficient, friendly and easy to follow.  I was very pleased with the support received on setting up my Foscam for remote viewing.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the money
Reviews.Author: California Buyer
Reviews.Content: I bought another camera setup from Costco and paid three times what I paid for this camera.  I loved the costco guardian setup with remote viewing screen and easy setup.  Problem was the cameras were useless!  Couldn't even make out a face... what's the point.  I finally bought the Foscam after much research.  The setup was not as difficult as some make it out to be, but I am more technically inclined than most.  The included 6mm lens is too close and completely useless, but I found a 4mm lens on Amazon for $10 that worked great.  I like both day and night vision.  You can actually make out faces at your door very clearly.  I posted a video of a couple suspicious characters on FB the other day and got a lot of people asking what camera it was because the great resolution.  I couldn't find a better camera for the money, but it's not as user friendly as others.  At the end of the day it was more important to get recognizable faces for me.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera and even better service
Reviews.Author: Keith
Reviews.Content: Ordered this camera through 1SaleADay.com. It was pretty straightforward in the setup however I did need to chat with a representative at Foscam. Sandra was more than willing to answer all my questions and assisted in getting the camera setup and working within my network and remotely very quickly. The camera is quiet when panning, has a clear picture in both day viewing and night vision and the sound quality is good. Overall a great Wireless IP Camera.

Reviews.Title: Device did not power on.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Received the device and it did not power on at all. This security camera is very big. Will look for something more compact and higher quality.

Reviews.Title: Great Service and a great product
Reviews.Author: Fella812
Reviews.Content: I received the camera for use as a baby monitor. The setup was straight forward and I had the product up and running in no time.When I did run into an issue I received prompt help through the online support chat, located on the main support page. Within minutes the IT person, Sandra, had my Email setup situation corrected.Very helpful and polite...

Reviews.Title: Review for FOSCAM FI18910W technical support
Reviews.Author: Petunia
Reviews.Content: The technical support person I spoke to fixed my remote access problem in less than 5 minutes. She knew that it had to do with the firewall and fixed it right away. Although I had to wait 1-2 hours for her to call me back, when she did, she fixed it right away.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Bargin Hunter "Deal Searcher"
Reviews.Content: Easy to install and set up.  I set mine up wireless and it works GREAT!  I can now see all the action on my back driveway at night.  Coons,Possums, cats etc!!

Reviews.Title: Great Customer Service Great quality camera
Reviews.Author: Francine Lavalle "Benny's Mom"
Reviews.Content: Consistently good product, great picture quality. Tec support very knowledgeable.I would recommend this camera - you will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Foscam tech support.
Reviews.Author: Constantine Gundunas
Reviews.Content: It took a long timem, Sara was very polite and patient, but the  problem was fully solve. I can now start enjoying my new F19821 IP Camera, Thank you Sara

Reviews.Title: technical support
Reviews.Author: ilija
Reviews.Content: I could not get access to my wireless settings on the camera and I was pleased to get fast respond and wonderful service over the phone from the nice gentleman (Felix).I like camera so far and can't wait to start using it..

Reviews.Title: Great help
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey M. Scace "Scace, J"
Reviews.Content: I had an issue with port fording, but as able to receive remote access eli from foscam help desk.  I recommend

Reviews.Title: If you know what your doing.. Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Gun -it
Reviews.Content: I bought 4 of these.  Two out of the 4 were bad, but it happens. Amazon quickly fixed it and sent out new ones. I have seen lots of negative reviews because of set-up.  If you know how to set up networks you will have no problem using these.  The features are great.  I also purchased a power over Ethernet block so I did not have to run power to each camera, works great.  The resolution is not HD but then again, I am not watching my cameras for entertainment.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Technical Support
Reviews.Author: Clint
Reviews.Content: The technical support was outstanding. The technician knew how to set everything up. I would recommend using the technical support department for all services.

Reviews.Title: Very good support and helpful.
Reviews.Author: camera1
Reviews.Content: Support is very first class. i will buy this camera again. Thank you to Foscam.I am now in the process of ordering another camera which i will be using in-doors.

Reviews.Title: Great night vision, but limited mobility
Reviews.Author: Robert O. Rieder
Reviews.Content: The fixed angle of this unit is it's only limitation. It has great optics and wonderful night vision. The rather narrow viewing angle is alright for large properties and distance applications. However, for my home, this unit needs to be mounted 30-50 feet from a target to get a good image. For grounds monitoring (swimming pools, tennis courts, parking lots and the like) this unit is superb!

Reviews.Title: tech support
Reviews.Author: mich
Reviews.Content: She was very proficient and knew her product very well. she was very patient and very thorough and very easy to understand.

Reviews.Title: My third Foscom camera
Reviews.Author: Richard A. Hasting Jr. "Submitted and Committed"
Reviews.Content: This is the best so far for me. I use this to monitor people approaching my front door, which is about 35 feet away from the camera. I plan on changing the lens to a 12 mm lens, which is still enroute.The camera does a great job in daylight, and a passable job at night. I have it set to send me an email with photos and to upload the photos to my FTP site when there is an alert. It is very cool. I do get a few false alarms, I think it is from the light being switched on or off.Downside: the setup often requires a camera reboot after a change to the configuration.  So, "change a setting, wait a minute for a reboot, log back in, and repeat ten times."  Also, the alert scheduler could be a little easier to work with... but this is an improvement over the previous Foscam cameras I have.But the picture is good and clear.Warning on setup, if you don't know what an IP DMZ is on a router, this is going to be a difficult setup. I'm just warning you on this. Get your techno-weenie network admin friend to come help you set this up. It will save you from entering a 1 star review.  If you can't assemble a IP network, you will spend  hours trying to figure this out. This was my third camera. It still took me nearly half an hour to set up, and I didn't have to reconfigure anything, I got it right the first time.Still, it works well for me and I would buy another one.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Great Support
Reviews.Author: James J. Eden
Reviews.Content: I just experienced some of the best technical support that I ever had. I manage technical projects internationally and Foscam sets a new standard in Customer service.

Reviews.Title: Foscam
Reviews.Author: Anchorism
Reviews.Content: Purchased a Foscam FI8918W and needed support with setup.  Process was a breeze with the remote in team viewer and they did an awesome job helping me do it!  Thanks a lot and kudos to your skills!

Reviews.Title: Technical Support
Reviews.Author: vjp710
Reviews.Content: I just purchased my forth Foscam camera and I love them.My router had been reset and I lost all the required info to view wireless .Tech Support  was great and I will tell others about the great products Foscam has and the best Tech Support

Reviews.Title: customer service for Foscam
Reviews.Author: sailorman
Reviews.Content: The rep quickly solved my problem with my wireless router.  Great service!Foscam FI8910W Pan & Tilt IP/Network Camera with Two-Way Audio and Night Vision (White)

Reviews.Title: works well
Reviews.Author: bridport7
Reviews.Content: The Tech people were very helpful-the best I've used. System seems to work well. Will know more when I can get it installed outside!!!!

Reviews.Title: FOSCAM support awesome
Reviews.Author: Sam N
Reviews.Content: The product from start of purchase has been great. Support has been excellent and the sales team was great as well. The cameras show a very clear sharp picture. Awesome

Reviews.Title: Good value outdoor wireless camera
Reviews.Author: Michael McCarty
Reviews.Content: I have purchased a couple of these now.  Live in rural US with severe weather extremes.  Have had no camera issues in more than 2 years of continuous use.  Easy to install and setup.  Night vision is impressive.  Only drawback is resolution of photos.  Adequate to see cars, people and animals walking by.  Difficult to make out important details like license plate numbers from more than 15 feet.

Reviews.Title: FOSCAM live chat tech support for FI8910W
Reviews.Author: John S
Reviews.Content: The videos on the web site ([...] [Basic Setup, Wireless Setup, Port Forwarding, and User & Alias Settings]) worked in all respects except that I couldn't get my new FOSCAM FI8910W to connect to my network via WiFi.  I have not had time to setup audio, motion detection alarms and recording yet.  I spent 3 hours on hold yesterday at 1-800-930-0949.  It sounded like I was bouncing through the automated voice mail system and that everybody was out of the office for the holidays and forwarded their phone, so I didn't even try the phone today.  The wait time for chat based tech support was only 1(one) minute.  Sandra Williams took me through the settings and failing to find an obvious error there she had me reset the camera to the factory settings.  Then we went through the setup again with the same results.  Then she escalated the call and got her senior tech involved.  In the end the problem appeared to be the encoding of the password for My WiFi network.  The Password stored in the camera needs to be explicitly set to ASCII or HEXADECIMAL (a pull down setting in the camera) and even though all of the other settings where correct the WiFi Network Password was not being sent and received correctly so the camera worked fine with the Ethernet cable connected but couldn't connect to the wireless LAN.  After this was corrected the camera works exactly as advertised.  Sandra Williams would have stayed with me but I could not continue at the time.  I am sure that if I need more help with the rest of the configuration beyond the videos and manual the text based support team will help me.

Reviews.Title: Very good for it's intended use
Reviews.Author: Bill James "Bill"
Reviews.Content: Setup was fairly straight forward as long as you have some basic networking skills, the documentation leaves a bit to be desired but in all honesty, I did not even use it for the initial setup. I use all Apple products so it was a little different than what Windows users would find. It is important to remember that once you do the setup while connected via CAT5/6 cable and are configuring the wireless side of the camera, that once you disconnect the CAT5/6 cable and let the camera reboot, you need to remember the IP address is going to change so you will need to look once again at your router to get the new IP address.I've looked over almost every single review and it seems to me that is the spot that gets everyone, Foscam cannot really do much about thatAlso, my frame rates seems a bit low if I look at the numbers, but you need to remember that different software will report the frame rates differently. The included web server, when viewed with Firefox/Safari does not display the rate, looking at it in Internet Explorer does display it rather high actually, then look at it in Zoneminder and it is much low, even leaving IE open. I've had 4 different software programs running all displaying widely varying frame rates so take them with a grain of saltIn the end, the video should not be choppy if there is only one connection to the camera, keep adding connections, all at the same time, then the rates will suffer.I do not need HD video for the areas I am using this camera, where I do need HD, I have a camera that can handle that. For the cost of this camera, the video is probably a little better than you would expect, Daytime is quite clear, Night time is fine but do not expect to make out detailed facial features unless they are very close to the cameraAll in all, if you buy this camera and use it in a manner that it is capable of handling, then you will not be disappointed, if you want to read license plates at 100 feet in all conditions, you need to spend about 5 times me to get that kind of resolution

Reviews.Title: Terrible interface, terrible viewing angle
Reviews.Author: psycroptic
Reviews.Content: The marketing material on their site and on Amazon fails to point out the fact that this camera will ONLY do motion detection. Unlike every other camera on the planet, you cannot set it to just save an image every second, 2 seconds, etc. It only will record if it detects motion, and the motion sensor (or whatever controls the motion detection) is AWFUL. Running past the camera results in 2 images of actual value: one of the back of my head, and the other of an extremely blurred image of my lower torso. COMPLETELY USELESS for ID purposes. Not to mention support is nonexistent, documentation is riddled with bad english to the point of being comical, and the viewing angle is stupidly small; you should be prepared to mount the camera at least 20 feet away from the area that you actually want the camera to record. Oh, and the wall mount for the thing is a piece of garbage; it's weak plastic and even weaker hand-twist mounts that even a mildly strong wind will loosen and cause the camera to shift wildly out of place.

So i called and within minutes he was able to fix the problem and i was able to view my foscam over the computer and on my Android phone.  The camera offers great picture quallity and motion.  I would recommend this product to all.

Reviews.Title: outstanding assistance!
Reviews.Author: pleader
Reviews.Content: excellent help and learned by watching how to domyself for future.  Camera has excellent fidelity, clarity and contrast.  We use it to watch our cat while we are away.

Reviews.Title: Foscam wireless/iphone access
Reviews.Author: Thomas
Reviews.Content: Calvin was Very helpful and knowledge on connecting and accessing the wireless cameras.  He was very patient and walked me through the entire set up.  Will definitely buy and use Foscam cameras.

Reviews.Title: front office clerk
Reviews.Author: nicole
Reviews.Content: The represenative was a great help with hooking up the foscam. I would say the customer service was a great help.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic camera for my needs
Reviews.Author: Silgo
Reviews.Content: Very great service from Foscam tech support for my cameras and protection of my house. I really like the wireless features of the survelliance. I can get emails when there is motion and now I am going to get it on my iphone with livecam pro!!!

Reviews.Title: Good value for the price
Reviews.Author: holson
Reviews.Content: Good basic outdoor camera. That said expect about 4-5 fps in wireless mode, about 15 feet night vision with resolution. Mounting hardware is challenged to keep the camera aligned when mounting horizontal, really have to tighten slightly with a wrench. Works fine with ISpyconnect.com software, which is free, if you mount so the camera picks up near by activity, like tree branches, shrubs and neighbor's cars then you will get more triggering on record then necessary.The provided software was easy to use but limited provided you have some experience with a WIFI network and your password. You will need additional software to do email alerts and internet monitoring, a little patience will pay off.My choice would be to wire the house with coax, direct connect cameras to a central recorder with HD and then push all of it to the internet but still seeing if having additional eyes seems really useful.

Reviews.Title: Foscam tech support with tech Calvin Harris...
Reviews.Author: Angela B.
Reviews.Content: I had bought a Foscam unit for our home, and the wireless aspect of it quit working when I changed internet provider/services.I contacted Foscam through their chat tech support, and an agent named Calvin patiently walked me through various steps and different apps to get the cam back up and running again.  A+ for Foscam's tech support, especially at 5pm on a Sunday evening!!!

Reviews.Title: works great.... customer service even better
Reviews.Author: Batman
Reviews.Content: So I bought this because my friend had one... I liked it enough to try it... I got it set up and when I ran into a networking issue, the IT help they have helped and got me up and running.They rock, This camera rocks...Gotham needs a new hero

Reviews.Title: foscam help
Reviews.Author: Happy listener
Reviews.Content: Calvin Harris called and really helped with adding new systems to get me up and going with alot of help. I am really bad at computer setup but he made everything great, the camera quality is great for the house security and working really well. Thanks Calvin for all your patience.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Cam
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: Very good service.  I purchased the cam from Foscam direct and received great service both chat and phone.  I had an issue connecting my wireless router to the cam but with their live support was able to get it up an running great.  Great camera too!

Reviews.Title: Too dificult to set Up
Reviews.Author: Mobilemachine
Reviews.Content: This is a very dificult system for use.You Assistance from customer support is very hard to get in touch with and quick to try and get rid of You.I will be throwing this cam in the trash and purchasing another brand.

Reviews.Title: Great Service

Reviews.Content: The camera is excellent and the service is fantastic too. I would recommend this camera to new users. The price and the service are well worth it.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Tech Support

Reviews.Title: Foscam troubleshoot

Reviews.Content: The technician did an amazing job!  He was patient with me and got to the root of the problem.  Thank you!!!

Reviews.Title: foscam camera

Reviews.Content: wonderful. It does have very clear picture, user-friendly and very reliable. The tech support  is really trusted and very helpful.

Reviews.Title: set up cameras

Reviews.Title: great help

Reviews.Content: cameras work great when directly connected with a static ipTech support was very helpful with resolving my problem and getting my cameras working properly

Reviews.Title: Camera Feedback
Reviews.Author: Glenn Baird
Reviews.Content: I like the pan and tilt feature and the very good image quality and color. The tech support saves a lot of time for me. I can recommend this camera for home security.

Reviews.Title: camera trouble shooting, ip address issue.
Reviews.Author: JNS
Reviews.Content: Good quality lens,picture quality better than average or than most small security cameras. Night vision is also good. Not a bad camera for home use. Still needs some tech problems ironed out, that can be frustrating for the average user.

Reviews.Title: foscam customer service
Reviews.Author: Percilla
Reviews.Content: WAS facing th eissue with thactive x . spoke with the tech support they were able to login to my computer and were able to resolve the issue with active x and also help with making thecamera work for wirelessly .  ... Technican was knowledgeable and quality of servicewas good. I would possibly purchase another camera in the future.

Reviews.Title: Tech Support Camera Foscam

Reviews.Title: Foscam review help
Reviews.Author: Jeff Bayer
Reviews.Content: I received quick, easy help to get my camera to the correct wireless settings. The phone help was completely worth it.

Reviews.Title: foscam setup
Reviews.Author: frank
Reviews.Content: Affordable camera with many important features. Easy to set up and use.Tech support had no wait time and very hepful in taking care of any issues.

Reviews.Title: Not a top of the line camera. But a good buy.
Reviews.Author: William A. Yeager
Reviews.Content: I wanted to go wireless as my old Lorex system is really short on applications and is really limited in what you can do with it. So I purchased the F18905W to test it out. Set up was really easy, however the software that came with the camera is very poor. I purchased Blue Iris which is a really great software package with a lot of applications you can use. I highly recommend that anyone wanting to go wireless with their computer, get the Blue Iris software. It's worth it. Now about the Foscam camera. It has a very poor angle of sensing. Only 22 degrees, but the distance is great. I have it mounted on my front porch to view the walk to the front door and it does a very good job but wish I had a wider angle of view. When using it wireless, the frame rate varies allot and play back of the video is somewhat jerky. The camera mount is rather cheap and the thumb nuts will break easy. I drilled out the holes and bought regulat machine screws which made the mount better. I did notice that during a power failure, intermittent one, that I had to take down the camera and connect it to my PC via a CAT5 to reset up the parameters. The cameras IP address changed??? So if you are going to use this camera in a wireless mode, you better have a long CAT5 cable just in case. Sure beats taking down the camera to redo everything. All in all, the camera is what they stated it to be. It is very good with excellent night vision. Would I purchase another F18905W? NO because of the angle of view only.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Product and Support
Reviews.Author: Joel M. Parris
Reviews.Content: This product is a very cool gadget and so far works as advertised.  I am having a few problems with some of the features, but working with Foscam's Technical Support to work through those issues.  On my first call to Technical Support, they were great!  The technician took control of my PC and set the camera up for me rather than just walking me through the steps or referring me to the user manual.

Reviews.Content: i was unable to make the port forwarding .. spoke with the tech support they were able to remotly access my computer and were able to make the cam work remotly with an static ip address.I really enjoy being able to view my outdoors when I am away from home.

If you have a mac, it does work but you need to use different windowns. Tech support is great, called them 3 times but it finally works! Great for the money!

Well, I want to let everyone know that I installed this FI8905W on 10/13/2012 and the picture looks Great! GREEN trees look a deep rich GREEN. Don't know if they corrected this issue from older models but the one I got from Amazon last week (10/12/2012) looks great!

Reviews.Title: FoScam Wireless setup
Reviews.Author: Ray lecuyer

Reviews.Title: Camera support

He did in 5 minutes what I couldn't do in much more time than that.The camera quality is very nice and the pan motion is very smooth.  I would recomment this product to others.This camera has additional features such as motion detection, auto phone and email alerts.  Very nicefor those of you that want additional protection of your home.John T. Houston, Texas

Reviews.Title: Foscam FI8905W Outdoor Wireless IP Camera, Silver
Reviews.Author: J. M.
Reviews.Content: I'm very satisfied with the camera.  Installation only took a few minutes and the camera works great.  Both daytime and night time picture quality is very good.  The field of view with the 6mm lens is a bit narrow, so I wouldn't recommend the camera if you intend on setting up the camera close to the area you intend on monitoring, but in my case I wanted to set up the camera to watch 2 outdoor sheds that were 60 feet away and the camera/lens gives me a nice, clear picture of both sheds.  The only reason I gave the camera 4 stars instead of 5 has to do with the motion detector alarm on the camera.  The motion detection does work and it will send you an email notification along with several snapshot pictures once triggered, but the detector is very finicky and it gives off a lot of false activations no matter how much I try to fine tune the sensitivity settings.  I can't seem to find the perfect sensitivity setting no matter what I do.  One of the biggest problems is that any kind of change in lighting conditions will set off the motion alarm.  large clouds passing in front of the sun, swaying tree limbs changing the shadow pattern in the yard,, will result in a barrage of false activations.  This is the only flaw I can find with this camera but I'm still happy with the camera.  I'm still experimenting with the motion alarm settings and hopefully will find a compatible setting to give me the least amount of false activations, but even if I don't I will only use the alarm when I'm away from home anyway so I'll just anticipate a lot of false activation emails and will simply discard them from my email mailbox.  For the money I think the camera give you a good bang for your buck, however if the alarm feature working perfectly is very high on your list of expectations then I would suggest looking at a different brand of camera.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Camera
Reviews.Author: tonijo
Reviews.Content: My foscam camera works great and talk to Ralph in customer support work with me on the phone and stayed until all my issues where resolved. Keep up the good work great service.

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected with regards to viewing width
Reviews.Author: William A. Patterson "Drummer Boy"
Reviews.Content: I thought that this camera would have a wider viewing angle since it is for outside use.  It is far narrower than expected.  To cover my back yard I would need three.  I have ordered some lenses to see if they can solve the problem.  I think Foscam should offer a choice of lenses for different applications.  I am hoping that a 3.6 lens will work...I now the 04 model has a wider viewing area but not as good at night.  They say this one has a 22 degree to 40 degree but I do not see it.  If so how do you get 40 degrees?OTher than that it is a good camera for the money.  The stand could be stronger but overall OK.

Reviews.Title: OK Angle of view is very narrow
Reviews.Author: mrmadjet
Reviews.Content: Camera works well but the angle of view is very narrow.  i had to purchase a wide angle lens to go along with this to make it work for my needs. over all i am satisfied with the product just wish there was more in the description to show you how wide the angle was.

Reviews.Title: Tech support SUCKS
Reviews.Author: Dan "Good products and services please???"
Reviews.Content: Got 4 cams...2 - FI8905W, one FI8918W, and one FI8608W which I love all of them.  software seems adequate, but....I have an issue with one outdoor cam that has no wireless.  Tech told me to send an email to sales for an RMA...well... that's been a week ago (4/17/2012...now 4/25/2012).  Should I be nice, or loose my righteousness???  I've called them several times and all those times the messages said they are serving 15 other customers...Programmed outgoing messages????...I'll be nice and say nothing more...thanks (for now)...but their rating is going down for me.  I WILL UPDATE.UPDATE:ok...so after a week and calling them relentlessly that night, the following day I received two emails, and later a phone call from the tech support.  Should I bump up the rating yet?  I'm not going to loose sleep on them is all I can say.  I should say one thing though about their cams, the software seems to be pretty good and FREE, and will handle up to 9 cams.  Purchased software for 50 bucks to try it, Foscam's built in cam software seems pretty good.  I WILL UPDATE.UPDATE...Going to put Pics for details but...can't get them on right now...let me figure them out and I'll post as soon as i can figure it out.  Or  I'll send you my email  WITH NO PROBLEM.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera!
Reviews.Author: Mauricio Souza
Reviews.Content: It's ease to install and to setup. Its Motion Detection / Alarm is very good. But I don'n like its bracket because it's very bad to keep position that I wanted it stay.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Quality

Reviews.Content: I highly recommend this product. It complies with all technical features and quality offered. The product was tested in low light and image quality is very good.

} } } Length:: 0:46 MinsNow I can see what my german shepherd is barking at night. Usually deer, but possoms's squirls, cats, all critters and people also like the gas or electric meter people.I was skeptical at first, with only reviews and not many picts to see what the view from the camera would be for my particular application. I don't want to let my dog out at night if deer are in the yard that "I" couldn't see. Rather not have my dog get kicked in the head by chasing them. The deer populate in my yard because I have over 30 fruit trees on my land. The deer eat the fruit that is on the ground, mostly apple trees. I can now see to the very back of my country yard and see if any critters are out there.The camera works great because it was built as a camera. BUT... it needs to be connected to your home network for you to reap the benefits of this cam or any IP cam for that matter. If you don't know how to setup your network, ask a friend, or call you internet provider, or foscam. Too many reviews I seen were based on they can't see anything and it didn't work. That is because it needs to be set up on your home network, and the camera is just that... a camera. But in order to view the camera, needs to be set up properly for your home wired or wifi network. I did have to turn the lens for better focus as shipped from the factory, but that is typical. I like the focus of my cams my way which made it even better to be able to adjust it.I use LiveCams Pro on my iPhone and couldn't ask for a better/cheaper system for the money, app, and camera.Just need how to figure out how to add pict. I didn't have a pict so was hard for me to make decision, but i'm glad I got this cam.UPDATED... not the best quality macbook screen recording of desktop from cam compared to real view especially after uploading and recorded vid artifacts, but you can see my german shepherd... he takes off after something, then you see his eyes, then he heads towards the back door. I dig this cam and will get another!

Reviews.Title: good camera, flimsy mount
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for Christmas.  It is a great camera, and I put a pan head motor on it, so I can see my entire yard with it. However, I had to improve the mounting hardware for it from the local hardware store, as the mounting plate that came with the camera was made of lightweight tin, and it stripped out the first time I tried to tighten it down.  The bracket could also be a bit longer, as it is not long enough to mount it on a wall and tilt the camera up.  So the review is because of the mounting hardware, not the camera.  I bought more sturdy mounting hardware for under $5, so it was more of an inconvenience than anything.  The camera is great, and has a really good infra-red sensor, with a 75 or 80 foot range.

Reviews.Title: I've been happy with  them
Reviews.Author: ham_n_bill
Reviews.Content: I have two of the outdoor(F18905W) cameras and two different indoor cameras. I have had no serious problems with set up or operation except with one new camera that didn't function. Foscam's service dept arranged a RMA right away with out hassle. Return was prompt and fuss free.A very big deal here is to follow the directions. It takes about 30 minutes to get one set up for wireless then port forwarded through your router to the outside world. I can see all four from anywhere. It's worth the $20/yr for the dyndns.org/PRO account to make them accessible.One indoor camera has been in continuous operation for over a year.(F18918W)Friends have installed them around their farms to watch livestock and wild critters.

Reviews.Title: bad hardware bad software
Reviews.Author: Ajay Lall
Reviews.Content: This camera drops wifi connection repeatedly and cannot be found on the netwoork with the utility provided. Sometimes will start working after disconnecting and reconnecting  power supply. Cannot be relied upon maybe needs a firmware fix. Picture is of poor quality --look elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: Stimpy
Reviews.Content: I just noticed that the price went up on this camera! Glad I bought it when I did! Works great. Was very easy to setup and install. The software is easy to work with. Have already recommended this to friends, family, and neighbors.

Reviews.Title: Easy Setup for a somewhat tech savvy user
Reviews.Author: Rob Nath
Reviews.Content: Wasn't quite sure what to expect, but this camera works as advertised.  As long as you know a little bit about networking, it's very straightforward.  The built in browser isn't the best in the world, but for this price, and the fact that this is an outdoor unit, makes this a great buy.  The motion sensor works, is sending me pics, and I'm using IP Cam Viewer Free on my Android phone, works great.  It's not the best camera in the world from a quality standpoint, but for security purposes which is what I bought it for, it's great.

Reviews.Title: Who Needs Network Experience?  Follow The Instructions.
Reviews.Author: Ryan Cawdor "Scarecrow"
Reviews.Content: After reading all the reviews of this camera I decided to post my own thoughts.  The camera itself is physically sturdy and has good daytime viewing.  Night viewing is good but obviously not as good as daytime since the camera relies on an external light source or/and the built in Infrared lights. The mount that comes with the camera is basically junk and should be discarded.  I bought a different mount for it after I realized that the mount that comes with it doesn't hold the camera position well.  The camera will move around especially if it is not "hanging" down but instead is mounted on a vertical wall.  Back to the viewing capability: The "range" on the camera for night viewing is good and I can see my neighbors across the street.  Facial features at more than 60 feet or so are not really discernible, especially at night.  No audio on this camera and you cannot turn off the Infrared lights which glow and are easily seen at night.  Make sure you mount the camera out of reach.The biggest complaint I see on the reviews are the problems people are running into when setting up the camera for wireless use.  I am no computer guru and only follow instructions and I had this camera up and running wireless in 15 minutes total time.  It's really simple folks: Plug the LAN cable (provided) from the camera to the router, plug in power supply for the camera, access the camera with a browser (I used Firefox) IAW the instructions and then set it up on the Administrator screen.  Don't forget to assign a password to the Admin account, especially if you intend to use it wireless.  Go through the Administrator screen and find the section to "Use Wireless" and check that box.  Once you click on "submit" it will reboot the camera.  After about 10 seconds into the reboot all you have to do is UNPLUG the LAN cable from the camera.  Once a minute or so goes by run the IP Camera program and your wireless camera should be visible in the box.  Click on it and open Internet Explorer (Not Firefox) and log in to the camera.  Now you can play with all the features and learn the software and how the camera works.  Setup your "record" path if you intend to record.Once you get more cameras you can add them to this camera and actually have up to 9 cameras running simultaneously....recording if you wish.  I have two Foscam 8918W cameras running with my outdoor camera with audio and video being recorded simultaneously for all three (no audio on the outdoor camera).  About 39 minutes of time is roughly 850 meg of disk space for EACH camera.  Not a big deal if you have a large hard drive and delete the files after a couple of days.Overall I think this is the best camera for the buck!Updated 29MAY2013: This camera has been on since October of 2011 with zero problems!  I cannot complain it is worth every dime!  To me it was very easy to setup and very easy to use with the software provided by the company.  Great buy!  My other two indoor Foscam cameras have also been up and running continuously for the same amount of time with no issues!

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: siyer17
Reviews.Content: 3rd foscam, have 2 indoors and ordered 2 more indoors and this outdoor cam. excellent camera, set up might be a lil difficult if u r not computer savvy, but the camera works as described. if anyone is looking for a good webcam software go for  Blueiris. for $44, unlimited cameras, functionality, recording , recording on motion detection and sending alert by SMS and email is awesome. 5 stars for the camera and blueiris software. together they make an excellent combo.

Reviews.Title: Works as intended.
Reviews.Author: T. Vile
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item through another retailer for less but have to say that it does work well.  The documentation is horrid and could use some help but anyone with basic knowledge of networking and computers should be able to get this working within an hour.Overall the price and performance is decent but the documentation is marginal but can't complain for the price paid of $80.Update 4/3/13Camera is going strong still and have not had many issues with it. Had some problems with the wifi disconnecting but was resolved with an update. We have had 0 degree weather and the camera worked throughout the entire time outdoors.

Reviews.Title: Can't get any better for the price
Reviews.Author: Jonathan
Reviews.Content: Full of features, very easy to setup (not sure why so many people had so many issues.)  I will say that I am an computer consultant so I'm sure that plays a role as to why this was so easy for me to setup because I do a lot of these things on a normal basis anyway.  That said, I still think it's fairly simple if you just follow the directions.You plug it in with the RJ45 cable (cat5) and power it on, you install the camera ip tool and it finds the camera on the network for you, you then put that ip address into your browser of choice and then login.  From there it's just customizing it how you want.  I set it up with wireless and it sits roughly 60 feet away from my router.  The picture is near real time (30 fps) very surprised on the quality and speed of the video.  One thing to watch out for is you may not pick up the camera with your wireless router if you have a wireless G or N router.  It seems to operate on wireless B (has a further distance but not as fast as G) I just went into the wireless settings on my router and told it to use mixed mode or B&G; mode.I have it setup with motion detection and to email me with pictures, which works very well.  I'm keeping tabs on it from work as I'm typing this through my browser and I was testing the positioning with a free app on my Droid X.Can't go wrong with this camera, I will be purchasing more soon.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed and wouldn't buy again
Reviews.Author: Lea
Reviews.Content: We have 3 Indoor Foscam cameras and needed one outdoor. Bought this one and was very disappointed.Indoor cameras are great but this one needs a lot of improvements.Cons:- useless lens 6mm. We had to buy separate lens 4mm from monoprice and changed it. Much better but still extra cost. Plus you lose focus quality, little less sharp.- the mount is so crappy.  broke before we even tried using it. Had to buy different. Again extra cost.- the length of power cord is too short for outdoors. Had to buy extra long one, again extra cost.- the camera doesn't tilt, pan, zoom, no sound. I wish we could move it at least 45 degrees both sides but it's static one position.- price for this should be $50 max. Too expensive for such limited camera.I don't have any pros.I don't recommend it and I wouldn't buy it again. Instead I'd buy foscam indoors and mounted outdoors in covered patio.

Reviews.Author: Ed
Reviews.Content: using this to check on health care worker assisting my ,mother in law. this helps give peace of mind. The clear picture and panning are very helpful.

Reviews.Content: Kate at foscam tech support was great at getting our cameras on wifi and the clarity of the camera and remote access is awesome. Tech support was propmt in returning our call and had the cameras up and running in 10 mins.

Reviews.Title: Foscam is terrible, no service and dishonest
Reviews.Author: T. Meadows "TM"
Reviews.Content: I have 8 of these cameras and thought everything was great until I needed customer service from Foscam. BE AWARE that if you purchase directly through Foscam that you run the very real risk of losing your money.  I paid for my last camera on 12/07/12 and it is now 12/26/12 and I still have not received it.  The package was lost in shipment and now Foscam is ignoring my requests for a replacement.The cameras work well enough but if you need support you are out of luck.  Foscam is a very dishonest seller.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Customer Service!!!
Reviews.Author: sid590
Reviews.Content: Received this product and needed instruction on how to connect wireless. Called Foscam and was up and running within a few minutes. Tech support was wonderful with assisting installation. I would certainly recommend this product to anyone looking for a good surveillance camera.

Reviews.Title: Tech support
Reviews.Author: john nordahl
Reviews.Content: Assistance with remote camera set up was easy and fantastic. Very courteous and fast! Ralph the tech was very knowledgeable and friendly.  The camera is high quality and has fine resolution, five stars.  I will be purchasing more cameras.

Reviews.Title: Good camera but very narrow field of view.
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: I have several Foscam Cameras, and have been very happy with them.  I am not so unhappy with this one that I would return it, but in my honest opinion this camera is not as well thought out as Foscam's other cameras.Cons: - Very limited field of view.  This can be changed by changing out the lens with a 6mm (42°) one.  You will need to order it from Foscam for 19.95.  I would suggest doing a youtube search on replacing the lens, so you know what to expect. - Unlike the other Foscam cameras this is a fixed camera.  I knew this when I bought it, and did not think much of it until dealing with the limited field of view.  They need an outdoor version with motion control. - Extra Cords hanging off the back of the camera.  You will have a Ethernet port and a reset switch hanging off the back of the camera.  IMHO they should have ports on the back of the camera with a rubber cover to keep the bugs and dirt out. - Can not turn on and off the IR lights as you can with the other models.

Reviews.Title: Very easy to install -- awesome camera for the price!!
Reviews.Author: Effie
Reviews.Content: I'm a 54 year old grandma, and if I can install this camera, anyone can! I think it's the router setup that is driving people crazy, and I highly recommend the DLink DIR-655 router for those of us who are router challenged --  I've had a terrible time in the past trying to set up a wireless router manually, it's just so complicated, so I did some research and bought the DLink DIR-655 router, which I highly recommend if you are going to install this camera.  The DLink is a very easy router to use, it has a setup wizard which virtually does all the hard parts for you.  When you install the camera, the first thing you should do is use the little cd that comes with it -- it has a quick start guide that you can pop up, which makes installation a lot more easy than trying to read the tiny instructions in the miniature manual that comes with it (I need reading glasses to read it).  I followed the quick start guide directions exactly, and had the camera set up and working in less than 15 minutes, a LOT less time than I had anticipated!  The software that comes with the program makes it easy to adjust the camera to any settings you wish.  We bought ours in order to keep an eye on an owl box that my husband put up last summer -- it is being checked out by a potential tenant and we have been asked by the State DEP to keep an eye on things and report to them what happens.  I'm very happy with this camera -- there are a couple of videos on youtube you can also check out, one on how easy it is to install, and another showing the video quality of the camera.

Reviews.Title: before you buy, yes it is rocket science, but does work well.
Reviews.Author: Ichabod Mudd "Ichabod mudd"
Reviews.Content: This unit is state of the art!Just the straight facts ( a fantastic product , I have 2)if you dont know how to install, SECURE wireless TCP/IP based  devices, seek help!but on the other hand, the manual is one of the best ive seen on , connecting rocket science. (im a retired electronics tech)I recommend the D-Link DIR-655 router ! (vastly more flexible !)before you buy?learn how your router is configured. (if you dont know?, then dont buy anything)1:find out your SSID ( a network device node  name)2:make sure its broadcasting the SSID. called "Visible" by D-linknext, you need your Encryption type3: I USE WAP PSK + AES  , my new router allows both WPA or WPA2 (auto) and TKIP and AES mode automatically.!!!  D-LINK rules !4: write down your Pre-shared key, use a long key with no spaces.  (mine is 20  digits long) I mix lowercase and numbers.so if you'd had printed out all that data on the Wireless network page, of said router ,then you'd already be ready.!  (above poster didnt)next RTM that is , on their web site, is 2 books. PDF'sconnecting upandsetting up the cam for ww. viewing.it connects up, just like all fine wireless devices on a secure network. nothing new here.but, it,s not a light bulb either.hope that helps you get connected !and btw ,there are hundreds of forums to help you do this.  no need to go it alone.and the price is like 1/10 price of the first units i used in commercial systems.so its a great deal too.

Her patience with my lacking technilogical knowledge was extraordinary.  She connected both cameras (wireless) to my computer and walked me through connection to my iphone.  Somehow she also sprinkled angel dust on my wireless printer and it started working.Thank you Judy for your extremely friendly, professional and knowledgable assistance in completing this task.Dennis

Reviews.Title: Very narrow angle
Reviews.Author: alien5
Reviews.Content: Cons:* Very narrow angle. It is almost useless as a security camera, because you cannot see much.* Heavy, you have to tighten the arm knobs hard* The IR LEDs are in the visible range, so you can see the red lights when approaching the area. Not a good feature for a security camera either.Pros:* well built, video quality is OKI use this camera with a Synology DS server and they pair well. You have to assign a static IP, otherwise you loose the camera if you reboot or loose power. To setup initially, you need to connect with a patch cable and then do the wireless setup.Unfortunately, I missed the return window, otherwise it would have been a return. I changed the location from front to side to cope with the narrow angle, but it is still not too good. I also have the FI8916W from Foscam and it is a lot better, even has pan and tilt for the same price, but it is for indoor use only.

Reviews.Title: I give up
Reviews.Author: Mr. Punch
Reviews.Content: A lot of people have bought this camera and have been very happy with it.  From my subjective view, on my system, it wasn't fit for purpose.In the ideal location, the signal was non-existent, and it was impossible to get a picture.  This contrasted with the Foscam M105l, which provided an almost adequate signal - but that had to be sent back, for other reasons.As a test, the F18905W was moved closer to the modem.  There was a signal, but the frame rate was poor, and when I did a constant ping (Windows 7 Command Prompt) the ping time seemed very varied, but overall was slow.  There were bursts of high speed pings - eg 7 ms - but the average was in the region of 500ms, and figures of over 1500ms were not unusual.  As for frame rate, one piece of software showed around 10 fps soon after I first plugged it in, but quickly moved down to 1 or 2 fps or even less.What do we conclude?  It is possible that the wireless modem I'm using is poor.  However my wireless laptop was working fine in the place where I was testing the camera.  Yet I concede that many people's systems have no problems with the camera - as the good reviews show.I have been using Amazon for over 12 years, and this is the second time I have returned a product because it didn't work as I expected it to.  The first time was about a week ago, with the Foscam M105l.  If you need an IP camera, that's going to be any distance from your modem, it's probably best to play safe and go for a wired solution.

Reviews.Title: Dishonest seller! Buyer beware!!!
Reviews.Author: Bruce Beard
Reviews.Content: I purchased a Foscam outdoor camera 7 months ago from these people. The camera sat un-used until last week. When I first turned it on it worked for about 15 minutes. A call to Foscam USA tech support confirmed that this camera carries a 1 year replacement warranty. I was told to contact the original seller for help in getting a replacement. An e-mail to the company yielded a poorly written (clearly English is not the authors first language!) denial of warranty.They claim that the warranty is for only 6 months. I have forwarded the reply to Foscam to see what they will do.Please think twice before purchasing from Hisgadget INC!!!Here is a copy of their reply:"Dear Customer,Thanks for contacting us.We are sorry that we could not provide RMA and return information this time, as the original 6 months warranty on your order has expired. The warranty valids from the date of purchase October 26, 2011 8:46:46 AM PDT. So please kindly understand that we could not help your return and exchange now.We sincerely appologize for any inconvenience caused. Your understanding will be highly appreciated.Best Regards,AshleyBetterstuff Lowerprice"

Reviews.Title: Another bad Foscam product
Reviews.Author: JvdV
Reviews.Content: As I promised after my Foscam indoor camera review, here's my F18905W review.After opening the box, I was initially pleasantly suprised by the quality of the packing.  Well protected in it's foam enclosure, all the parts present and a manual to boot.  After carefully taking all of it out and familiarizing myself with the install process, I proceeded to connect the ethernet cable to my router, and plugged in the power supply, looking for the tell tale green flashing light on the enormous ethernet plug that is permanently attached to the camera and sprouts both the reset button on a seperate lead as well as the power cord lead.  How anybody is supposed to get that through the wall in a convenient manner is a mistery.  But with a hole big enough, I guess I could drive it through in the back of my pick-up. Ridiculous.The camera housing itself seems to be made of aluminum and feels sturdy enough.  A beefy weight, it seems hardly likely that the mount supplied with this camera will be able to hold it up on a nice day, let alone on a windy day.  Flimsy is the nicest description I can offer.  The camera sports an impressive array of IR leds. The antenna was easy to attach at the rear of the housing, but is the 3 Db version and we all know how that performs on the other cameras.Once the moment arrived where I could "fire" the camera up and evaluate it's performance.........DOA  =  DEAD ON ARRIVAL!!!!!!!!Tried another Foscam power supply from similar camera.  Nada.Did not bother with Foscam tech support, as my experience with them for the indoor PTZ camera was bad enough already.  Thankfully I purchased the camera through a major vendor and returned it for a full refund.  The PTZ accompanied it's junky brother to the store.My recommendation.... DO not buy Foscam products.

It took over 5 hours just to get a picture on the screen and then another 3 hours trying to figure out how to get our router settings right and ending up screwing up everything on the router, we emailed tech support because that's the only way to get help, you can't speak to anyone and they didn't respond for two days. We finally called pre-sales support to send the camera back and were rudely told that "this isn't rocket science" and the guy try to talk us into keeping it and finally told my husband that we needed to email tech support for a return number to send it back and we emailed only to get a response that we have to contact the reseller to send it back, keep in mind they only give you 7 days to return anything. DO NOT BUY FROM THIS COMPANY!!!

Reviews.Title: Never Purchase !!
Reviews.Author: Michael Bower
Reviews.Content: This came to me as a used cam, it was ordered as new, and was returned for credit thanks to "Amazon".I must also include this:  I will never again purchase any product from or made by easy N or Foscam !There is no support anywhere in the US.They do not work, and you  can not get any one to help set them up. You can call Foscam for tech support, however they will charge you 39.00 for eachphone call. I did this, paid the fee, and they took control of my P/C and my very expensive router, and crashed it.It took 6 hours to get my P/C back on line. and my service provider had to replace my internet router.Cost of the new router not yet known.Michael Bower

Reviews.Title: Beware! TROJANS IF YOU ALLOW TECH SUPPORT TO SET THIS UP!
Reviews.Author: AmazonFan09876
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item through Amazon. I had a hard time setting it up so I called their tech support. I spoke to an individual with an Indian accent. I was told they must take remote access of my computer via software (they told me where to download it) to set up my camera. I questioned the tech if it was possible to guide me through the process without giving control of my comp, he said NO! He made the camera work. Now, I scan my computer almost every day for viruses....and have not had an issue for a long, long time (as in a year or so before my antivirus software found something). Low and behold I find trojans on my computer after he took control of my comp to set up the camera!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  AVG and Malware both quarantine these trojans but I scan my system again to find them back!!!!!!  I call up comcast they told me that I am basically on my own. I call up Amazon and explain the situation the rep was concerned and nice as can be but again she told me to post this review for others to see and they would take back the camera.Also, when the foscam tech support rep set up this camera he had complete access to my wifi password, name of my network and my ip address so essentially they have all of your info at their hands. They can hack in and out of your system!Now, I logged into my email, bank account and checked my credit report via a credit monitoring service I subscribe to before I scanned and found all of these trojans. I might be screwed and am worried someone has stolen my info.I implore all to becareful.Update: I have spent many hours and money (over 100.00 I should have never spent) on this issue. I had to switch out my modem with comcast so I could get a new ip address and I had to replace my computers hard drive and re-install all software. Also, I placed a fraud alert on my credit report, so I can be notified if someone tries to get credit under my name and changed the password on my email and all other accounts. Now I am not certain if I dealt with a sinister tech rep or it is a systematic problem. I would avoid the product but if you do purchase it ask for a US based tech rep per Amazon's reps suggestion. If for some reason you are compelled to purchase this piece of crap do not allow them to take control of your computer and if they tell you they must send this piece of crap back.

ProductInfo.Features:
Simple to setup, friendly GUI, remote viewing, record from anywhere anytime
Waterproof for outdoor installation, Auto IR-LED illumination for night vision up to 30 meters
Motion detection alert via email or upload image to FTP. Access management with password protection.
Supports all standard browsers and can be viewed remotely using smartphone software (not included)
Wi-Fi compliant with wireless standards IEEE 802.11b/g and supports both WEP & WPA WPA2 encryption
